text: We stayed at the Villa Seriska Satu in Sanur for 6 nights at the end of a 2 week holiday. It was perfect for us - masses of room, private pool, great home cooked breakfast from Chef Wayan who popped in each morning and minutes from the beach.  To get to the beach you have to walk through Sindu market which is great for last minute holiday bargains. We would recommend Sukanada arts - a little art shop at the back of the market where the artist produces his own work and it's all on display. We had a chat with him and while he didn't have anything that matched the colours in our home, he painted something based on our specifications with no obligation on us to buy ( massive risk for him but the piece he produced was so good and so moderately priced we did of course buy it). Back to the villa, staff were really excellent and couldn't do enough to help. I would recommend for those wanting to get away and just have some serious pool time which was all our kids wanted!

text:
Hi 
Just beck from 5 days at the Seriska Villa in Seminyak, the people are friendly and they genuinely aim to please, the Villa is of a low standard and does not live up to the pictures that are shown on the website or the reviews on Trip advisor???, it requires some serious upgrading and is in my opinion a basic 2-3 star villa, we could not use the outside areas due to the furniture being wet as its left out in the environment, there was a leak somewhere at our apartment so siting down outside was not an option. I have fed this back and have been assured by the management that these concerns will be rectified but unfortunately not for our time there.
Would not go back.
Lynn
title: Not as good as it looks

owner_response.text:
Thank you for staying with us, Lynn. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our service during your stay. 

With regard to the villa, thank you for your feedback at your checkout time. We have already carried out works in the areas you mentioned: some areas of the villa have been repainted; the loose cabinet door has been repaired and the outside tiles with moss have been cleaned. With regard to the outside furniture, we are in the monsoon season so the sundeck loungers and other all season furniture will have some condensation because of the humid air after any rain. After your departure we investigated the water on the pool deck. This was as a result of excess water from the air conditioners which you insisted on keeping on 24 hours even when you were not at the villa! We understand that you found the weather to be too hot for you, but we ask our guests to switch off the air conditioning units when they are out of the villa to help us protect the environment. We take all feedback from our guests seriously so thank you again for your feedback.

The Villa Seriska Team

text:
We just spent a week at Villa Seriska Satu in Sanur. We travelled with another family, so 2 couples and four children aged between 12 and 19. The Villa accommodated all people beautifully. From the minute we entered the Villa, the staff were fabulous. We were met by Wayan (the chef) and Kadek. Soon after Nilesh (the owner of the Villa) arrived to greet us, and then a little later, Putra - the manager of the Villa came to explain things. Putra was on hand all week by phone to ensure that our travel plans and other needs were met. There is a mobile phone that is available for use to contact any staff for the duration of your stay. Thomas is the driver that works for the villa and is organised to take guests on any adventures (at a very reasonable cost, charged at the end of your stay). 
Wayan and one of the girls cooked breakfast daily - and what a great selection of food and delicious. You can also ask for a meal to be cooked for lunch or dinner as needed. We had an Indonesian banquet after our day trip to Ubud and the food was wonderful - thanks Wayan and Kadek!
The villa is a walk of a couple of minutes through a small market to the beach where there are plenty of food options for lunch and dinner, and also very close to the main road for food options and shopping. The market is also great for shopping and bargaining. 
It’s great to have the run of the villa and the pool as needed. The staff are fabulous and can’t do enough for you. Your rooms are serviced each morning, breakfast is cooked, the living space is cleaned up and the turndown service at night ensures that bedrooms are mosquito free for the night. There is also a security guard outside for the night. Always felt very safe. 
We hope to stay again at the Villa.  It worked brilliantly for 2 families. Thanks to Nilesh, Putra, Wayan, Kadek, Rian, Thomas and Wayan!
title: Fabulous family holiday.

The pool is ideal and is located at the centre/ heart of the whole villa which means that each of the rooms have a beautiful view of the pool. The cabana is perfect for relaxing and eating breakfast. The menu offered covers all bases, from American breakfast to pasta or classic Indonesian. 

The location of the villa is perfect, jsut a stone throw away from the beach. The team are beyond helpful and are on hand to help with anything you need, they can help you rent a car, scuba dive or surf. 

My stay was incredible and I’m already considering returning and staying in one of the other villa’s!

text: Do not think twice about booking this beautiful villa. We visited Bali for the first time on our honeymoon and this incredible place was the highlight of our stay. Not only is the space so breathtaking, a cozy and sophisticated villa supplanted right in the tropics, but it is located in the heart of Seminyak, close to what became our favorite restaurants, bars, and shops. We were just 15 minutes from the beach and a few steps away from the busiest street in Seminyak, but while in the villa we felt as if we were miles away in the Indonesian jungle. The pool is gorgeous and the space surrounding the villa is lush with greenery and flora. The villa itself is incredibly clean and well taken care of by the staff and the bed was unbelievably comfortable. We cannot understate how friendly and accommodating the entire villa staff was while we were there. They made us amazing Indonesian breakfast every day right in the villa, they were available day and night to meet whatever need, they organized amazing tours with a personal driver in Ubud and Uluwatu at prices that were way, way, below anything offered by third parties, they provided us with a preloaded mobile phone and round-the-clock guidance for our stay. Visitors are often warned against the bugs but the staff were so diligent about prepping the house to repel mosquitos with spray and coils that we lasted 6 days without a single bite! This is easily the most beautiful place we've ever stayed and it was so difficult to leave! Even as we walked around Seminyak we noticed how superior our villa was to others around. Many thanks to amazing Nilesh, Made and Putra- we'll definitely be back!
title: Incredible holiday in paradise!

text:
Note: We are staying at three bedroom villa part of this property.

I had high expectations with this Villa after reading some glowing reviews, and this Villa easily surpassed all expectations.

Let's talk about the hard goods first - the Villa itself. It is situated in the heart of Seminyak while being very serene. We did not hear a single motor noise during our stay (so far). The property is very well maintained and clean. The decoration and furnishing are kept in tradition of 'Bali style' while paying attention to the modern luxury. We truly appreciate the smallest of  detail of the design being well thought of.  Two minor feedbacks are that the WiFi coverage can be improved around the property and that the second floor living room could use an air conditioning. 

Second - the service is comparable to the highest standard in hospitality industry which is very surprising considering this is not a full service resort but feels like it!  Starting from the get go, we were picked up at the airport, greeted by the property manager and later by the owner. The staffs are all extremely accommodating and friendly. We even had breakfast cooked in the kitchen with the staffs today!, and the villa cleaned twice during the day, and around the clock security guard. We had our laundry done at a very affordable price. The staffs of course is fluent in English and within a phone call away if need be.

Overall, we ultimately seek comfort and service. This Villa is so close in perfection in achieving those. The service is easily 10/10 with virtually no room for improvement, and the Villa itself is an 9/10 with great decor/design and some minor room of improvement. Honestly, this villa overall is an easy 9.5/10. I would definitely recommend this Villa to family and friends.
title: Sublime. Near perfection.

owner_response.text:
Thank you for taking the time to write such a detailed review of your wonderful stay at Villa Seriska, Bali. 

We are really glad that your holiday with us and the experience of our service was near perfection! Our staff offer the best of Balinese hospitality so that our guests can take back fond memories of our beautiful tropical island. 

We are looking forward to welcoming you and your family back to Villa Seriska soon!

The Villa Seriska Team
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: The staff were extremely responsive and helpful throughout our stay. Putra helped coordinate the logistics for a variety of group activities, allowing us to relax and enjoy our stay. Even after we left the villa and forgot a couple of items, Putra personally brought them to us on the other side of the island. These are the kinds of experiences that make for a wonderful holiday!
title: Great hosts

owner_response.text:
Thank you for taking the time to write such a nice review of your stay at Villa Seriska, Bali.

We are really glad that you had an awesome holiday with us. All our staff aim to provide the highest level service with a warm smile. 

We are looking forward to welcoming you and your family back to Villa Seriska soon!

From The Villa Seriska Team
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: I spent 9 days here with my family of 6 adults in September/October 2016.  The location was perfect for us.  The villa is very private and quiet with all rooms opening on to a lovely pool and garden and the the beach and main street of Sanur are both only minutes away. We liked that this was a  quieter/ family spot, compared to Kuta etc on the other side of the island .Nilesh and his staff offer excellent service and great food, if you choose to eat in. It all made for a very relaxing holiday.
title: This villa combines a beautiful quiet environment with excellent staff and service.

owner_response.text:
Thank you for taking the time to write such wonderful review of your stay at Villa Seriska, Bali.

We are really glad that you had an lovely, relaxing holiday with us. All our staff aim to provide the highest level service with a warm smile. 

We are looking forward to welcoming you and your family back to Villa Seriska soon!

From The Villa Seriska Team
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: My husband and I spent our honeymoon in Bali earlier this month (September 2016). We were looking for a one bedroom villa online and came across this amazing place. We could not ask for more. We stayed for 10 nights. The villa was beautiful. Very clean and organized, nicely decorated and had all the amenities we were looking for. We stayed at the Seminyak location. It was very well situated and close to everything. We were very pleased with the location. Made and Coma made sure our vacation was more than perfect. One of the things we most liked was the shower, which was "outdoor". We also really enjoyed our rides with Thomas, the driver. He was very nice and took us to great places. We loved everything about this villa. It made our honeymoon the best ever!
title: Best honeymoon ever!

owner_response.text:
Thank you for taking the time to write such a lovely review of your stay at Villa Seriska, Bali. 

It was our pleasure that you choose our villa for your honeymoon and found our villa & service fantastic  

Our staff offer the best of Balinese hospitality so that our guests can take back fond memories of our beautiful tropical island.

We are looking forward to welcoming you and your family back to Villa Seriska soon!

The Villa Seriska Team
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
The thing that impressed us most was that nilesh organised ramps to be installed in the villa for our sons wheelchair- he was very happy to do it, which we really ape coated and made our sons holiday so much easier and enjoyable. On top of that, they had ramps built to cover steps en route to the beach- can't ask for better than hospitality and service than that! 
The villa is very lovely, especially the pool and bathrooms and it was lovely to be able to treat the whole villa like our home away from home.  The staff were great too. Great location between Main Street and beach. Great stay- would thoroughly recommend.
title: Great location and very accommodating to our needs

text: We stayed for 7 nights 4 Adults and 3 Children. Breakfast cooked each morning by Wayan was wonderful. The girls that looked after us were fantastic invisible when not needed but we're always available when needed. Would stay again in a heartbeat.
title: Amazing stay

text:
6 of my family stayed here for 8 nights  to celebrate my mum's 70th Birthday.
From start to finish the whole experience was fantastic. The Villa is beautiful and in a really great position in the town and a stones throw from the beach. It is so quiet and peaceful you could be in the middle of nowhere.
Nilesh and his staff are wonderful and couldn't do enough for us, even taking us out to organize a cake for my mum's birthday. I would highly encourage you to have Whyan the chef cook for you, his food was amazing and he suggested lots of Indonesian food for us to try, which of course we did. The housekeeping staff do a fabulous job and again nothing was too much trouble, special thanks to  Ryan and Kadek. 
We also had a couple of days out with Thomas the driver, who suggested places to go and never tired of answering our many questions.
One last mention of Putra the manager who was available to us all the time on the mobile phone he gave us to use. He is lovely and went out of his way to ensure our stay was fabulous. He particularly pushed the boat out for mum's birthday, making sure that everything was perfect, even bringing fireworks!!
Everyone made this a very special time for my mum and our family, thank you so much, I am extremely glad I chose to stay here.
The villa is 8 years old and starting to look a little tired around the edges, but Nilesh is on to this and setting some days aside to give it a little TLC, however it's easily fixed and will not distract from your enjoyment.
title: Better than a 5 star hotel

text: The villa is amazing! We (4 adults and 3 kids) stayed at Villa Seriska for 14 days but we wish we stayed there for much longer! Super helpful and friendly staff. They helped us with discovering Bali and provided with everything what we needed. We would/will definitely stay again and recommend to others. MANY THANKS to Nilesh and his great team for having the best holidays ever!
title: Paradise on earth!

text: We were a group of 5 adults and 3 kids and after much research choose Villa seriska satu sanur for a 10 day holiday.  Words cannot describe how perfect this villa was for us. The villa is even bigger and more beautiful than the pictures.It was immaculately clean and so well equipped .From the airport pick up to being met at the villa by Nilesh and Putra we were made so welcome. We cannot sing the praises of all the staff enough, every possible need was met with a beautiful smile and many laughs and by the end of the holiday we all felt like one big family. Make sure you eat in the villa as our several breakfasts and dinners were 1st class.We would highly recommend booking villa seriska satu sanur for your next holiday, we can't wait to return.  THANKYOU
title: Perfect Holiday for 8

text:
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Villa Seriska in Seminyak. It was a beautiful 1 double bedroom villa but it very comfortably accommodated 3 of us due to the 2 extra double sofa beds. The surroundings are great, very secluded and great for privacy. 

Amazing open plan lay out with characteristic decor, a very generous sized swimming pool and 2 luxurious bathrooms. 

The location in Seminyak was fantastic, close to Seminyak Square and the beach.
The staff were amazing and truly added to our experience in Bali. Putra and the team are dedicated, welcoming and will go above and beyond to help you with anything you might require. Our luggage was lost on arrive in Bali and Putra even drove by the airport to check if it had arrived for us, communicating with the airport staff and arranging the collection of our baggage
. 
We stayed for 3 nights and wish we had booked for longer. 
Will definitely be back and would highly recommend this amazing villa.

Thank you so much for making the start of our trip extra special!
title: Fantastic stay in Seminyak

text: Nilesh and his staff were beyond perfect! From the moment we set foot in his lovely villa, we were greeted with smiles and helpfulness all around. They helped us arrange a few surf trips and explorations around the island, and gave us great recommendations for places around town. The villa is beautiful and very very comfortable. It's also located in a great part of town with easy access to anything you will need for your stay. It will be hard to leave the gorgeous poolside, but once you're out and about in Sanur, you'll be glad you did. We also enjoyed amazing Indonesian meals prepared by his chef and staff. We loved the food so much we often chose to stay in and eat by the pool instead of go out. It was great! I would love to visit this amazing place again, and would highly recommend it to anyone looking to have a great stay in a Sanur villa. It was especially perfect for our larger group, and everyone was thrilled with the accommodations!
title: The best place in Sanur!

text:
Staying at Villa Seriska was a super treat! A treat not even a 5 star hotel can offer. Traveling with our parents for the 1st time in Bali, the 5 of us stayed at Nilesh's 3 bedrooms villa in Seminyak for 4 nights and we could not have asked for a better place for a relaxing family vacation!

We were warmly welcomed right from the start when precision driver Thomas picked us at the airport. Then, a formal welcome by the host Nilesh himself, along with villa manager Putra and part of the room service team. After a detailed introduction of the villa, Putra gave us a dedicated cellphone for 24 hour inquiries or assistance. It won't be long before you knew you can trust them with anything. Trust them with your next day travel plan, trust them with your stomach, trust them with your stay. 

The villa is clean, comforting, and with all the amenities needed, most importantly, it has a pool. The neighborhood is quiet and safe, it's only 5 min walk to supermarket/restaurants/ATM, and 10 min to seminyak beach. 

What made our experience so great was the people (Nilesh, Audrey, Putra, Thomas, Wayan, "Monster"... you guys are amazing), so thoughtful, caring and humble. We would recommend this place to nobody but ourselves !
title: Villa Seriska, a gem in Bali

text: If you plan to spend relaxing holidays in a very confortable place, villa Seriska might be the right place . Do not forget the housings staff in Bali is very professional for cleaning, cooking and take care of the children. So, go ahead and believe me, you will never regret your stay!
title: CONE OF THE TOP PLACE AT SANUR!!!!

text: Nilesh was an outstanding host - no surprise he's a superhost. He welcomed us very warmly and showed us around the villa and gave recommendations about the surroundings. He's an expert in hospitality, something that was visible by how his entire staff acted as well. Most of the staff have been with Nilesh for many years and provided a more luxurious service than many 5 star hotels. The villa is very close to the main street of Sanur, yet you don't hear any noise at all. You can relax at the pool with your family. The beds are very comfortable and the bathrooms are spacious and simply fantastic. We had an excellent stay and would like to be back!
title: Fantastic

text:
As soon as we arrived at Villa Seriska we knew it was a mistake we were only staying one night.  
Greeted on arrival by the lovely hosts, then handed over to the friendly, helpful and attentive staff. 
Quality of accommodation and food was the best. 
Easy, private beach access. 24hr security.
title: Beautiful setting, great service

text:
I stayed here with two friends in February for four nights and I cannot recommend the place enough.
The Villa is spotless with the cleaning staff in daily.  Rooms are spacious and the decor is beautiful.

The staff make this place.  From the pickup driver at the airport, cleaning staff, security, our own personal go to person who gave us a mobile phone and told us to contact him anytime we needed help to the owner of the villa and his beautiful dog!

 If you want to stay in Bali, feel safe and relax - THIS IS THE PLACE!!!
title: HEAVEN!

text:
This is an incredible place to stay. We were a group of four friends who were traveling around Indonesia and had the pleasure of staying for several nights at Villa Seriska (really, we wish it could have been several weeks). Putra and the rest of the staff are so helpful in making your stay effortless - they made it easy to get meals, do laundry, hire a driver, and plan itineraries. You can easily have a group of six or more people here - the rooms are beautiful, bedding is nice, and bathrooms are luxurious.

Note that the neighborhood is more laid back and quiet than some other parts of Bali, so not the best place to stay if you're hoping to go to big nightclubs or the like. Sanur is more laid back, with an older crowd, with good restaurants.

Highly recommend Villa Seriska!
title: Large, modern, beautiful, and with amazing staff

text: Our stay in Sanur with Villa Seriska was absolutely a week to remember! The villa is gorgeous, absolutely as beautiful as the photos show and the service was world class. Between Thomas (driver), Putra (villa manager) and the lovely staff who clean the villa daily and are around to help with whatever we needed, we were in the lap of luxury for the week we stayed at Villa Seriska. Sanur is a quiet, family-friendly area and we hadn't stayed there before but will certainly be going back because of its pristine beach and variety of restaurants. Apart from going on a few trips out of the villa to places like Ubud and Uluwatu, we spent most of our time relaxing by the luxurious pool and enjoying home-cooked meals by the villa chef! Definitely will be returning to this wonderful villa, for both the setting and the quality of service on offer.
title: Perfect stay

text: Our family of 6 stayed for 4 nights and had a fantastic time. The villa is absolutely beautiful, with great amenities and friendly staff. We had breakfast and dinner every day prepared by the villa's private chef.  The meals were delicious and far superior to the restaurants we tried.  We cannot wait to come back!!
title: Beautiful villa and amazing staff

text: This is a beautiful Villa and the staff is great. They are always responsive and take good care of the Guests. We were given a mobile phone to with some credit to make local calls which was really helpful. And any review of this villa is not complete without mentioning  Putra, the helpful, friendly Villa manager. I will recommend this villa to anyone and will definitely come again.
title: Excellent Villa

text:
All the staff were lovely and helpful. Putra gave us a cellphone when we got there so any time you need anything you just text him! I definitely recommend arranging for Putra to book you an in-room massage - massage was really good (not amazing) but for 150,000 IDR you can't complain!!

Breakfast was good value ($8USD for fruit, delicious cooked breakfast, and juice).

One thing I would say is don't bother booking a driver for short distances as it is cheaper to taxi (Putra drove us from Seminyak -> Kuta for $15USD (about 200,000 IDR) but a Bluebird taxi will get you there for under 50,000).
title: Great stay

text: Villa Seriska is a beautiful place with a committed staff to ensure guests have an enjoyable stay. They go out of their way to accommodate your requests. It was nice to feel pampered in a luxury villa with your own chef and staff on standby. Nilesh (Host), Putra (Manager) and Thomas (Driver) understood our requirements and planned an itinerary which made us experience and enjoy Bali to the fullest. The villa is true to its pictures and I m going to recommend this villa for all my friends. Once again thanks to all...you made our trip an memorable one.
title: Beautiful Villa and Amazing Staff to Pamper YOU

text: I was lucky enough to spend 4 fantastic nights at Villa Seriska Dua in Sanur where the staff are extremely friendy, helpful and willing to cater to all of your needs. However most of the time you don't know that they are there. Everything in the villa was superb from the comfort of the beds and the fully equipped kitchen down to the the beautiful, natural, essential oil products in the bathroom. The outdoor dining area was perfect for enjoying dinner in the cool of the evening and the abundence of sun lounges by the pool ensure you can have a place to laze in the sun or in the shade all day long. I practice yoga and this was the perfect place for this as there were so many great places to practice. The garden is quiet and peaceful and a great place to meditate. Evenings were lovely at the villa. The on site chef can cook up any meal you request and the staff take extra measures to ensure that the bedrooms are free of mosquitos for a great nights sleep. Nelish and Audry are wonderful hosts and were there to greet us when we arrived and there to say goodbye when we left. I highly reccommend Villa Seriska Dua for couples who want a luxurious private retreat or families wanting an amazing stress free holiday.
title: A Luxurious Retreat for Couples or Families

text: Our visit to Bali could not have been better, largely due to the hospitality of the staff at Villa Seriska.  From pick-up at the airport, to in villa dining, to driver/tour services, the staff went above and beyond to make our stay amazing.  The villa offers privacy and space while maintaining and even exceeding the amenities of a large hotel.  We definitely recommend staying a Villa Seriska!
title: Amazing Staff and Beautiful Property at Villa Seriska!!

text: My family and I had a fabulous stay at the villa. The villa itself was even more beautiful and luxurious than the images suggested. Nilesh and the villa staff where very welcoming and ensured that we had everything that we needed. It was fantastic to have our own chef to make our dinners and breakfasts especially having small children. It meant that we could relax and enjoy the company of the rest of the family whilst our children played. I would highly recommend having the chef Wayan make you a Indonesian banquet as well as a seafood BBQ, both were absolutely delicious! We have been to Bali 4 times previously but this was our first trip to Sanur and it is now our favorite destination in Bali! It is a great place for a relaxing family holiday due to the safe and clean beach, the multitude of great restaurants within a close distance as well as the footpaths being well maintained and wide for safe passage for little ones walking or in prams. The villa is located well within Sanur being in close walking distance to the beach and the main road which both have great places to eat. Taxi's are also cheap and easy to come by if you want to travel further afield. Nilesh was very easy to communicate with and was very prompt in replying to emails. I look forward to coming again next year for some more pampering, relaxation and delicious food.
title: Luxurious private villa experience in Sanur

text: We stayed with Villa Seriska in Sanur Bali in June 2015. We were 6 persons staying for four nights. We were picked up in Ubud by the Villa Seriska driver and taken straight to the villa. We have stayed a few different places in Bali, but this villa is really the most impressing place. Beautifully Bali designed house, it's spacious, luxurious and private at the same time. With one common area and several different bed rooms situated in different houses, it's ideal for a large family or a group of friends. We loved the huge pool and the lounge area - you don't really need to leave the house:) But if you do, the location is very good close to the Sanur main street with plenty of shopping, food and drink options. There is also a "secret" passage through a market place that will take you to Sanur beach in less than 5 minutes. I personally prefer Semaniyak beach other Sanur as it allows for surfing, but Sanur beach is perfect for families especially with younger kids (like us). The Villa Seriska staff were extremely friendly and accommodating. There is a cook pretty much on call 24/7  but we would suggest that you agree with him from the very start what you expect and need. That will make it easier for them to plan and give you some more private time if that's what you want. PS. Try the Beef Rendang - it's incredible! The staff will help organize scooters and also arranged a baby cot for our daugther. We loved the place and would definitely recommend it to anybody looking for this kind of venue in Sanur!
title: Amazing villa in Sanur

text:
What else to say? Bali is absolutely heaven, and our fantastic family holiday was
completed by staying at Villa Seriska. Excellent service, from the pick-up
at the airport to the meals cooked by our own private chef. Gorgeous villa, 
with such helpful owner and staff who went out of their way to show us
around and recommend restaurants and trips to make our visit as 
perfect as possible. The villa is in a great spot, just a short walk to the beach
and also the main street of Sanur with lovely restaurants and shops. 
As well as the 5 star service we received, the villa has a nice large pool for
the children to play in, as well as a pavillion to lounge on which is where
we spent a lot of time! The staff keep the villa in excellent, clean condition
and the atmosphere is perfect for spending a lazy day by the pool - not to
mention fast wifi coverage everywhere! If you're looking for a tranquil, 
luxurious environment with first-class service, Villa Seriska is the place!
title: Paradise on the Island of the Gods

text:
Amazing villas, staff were so helpful especially Putra and Nilesh, they went out of their way to help us on multiple occasions. The villa was huge for 2 of us, it was luxury and we would definitely come back again!
Claire and James
title: Villa seriska seminyak

text:
I don't know where to start in my praise of this absolutely wonderful villa and those who make it work so well..... 
We were picked up from our previous villa by Thomas, who also took us out for a day sight-seeing and dropping us back to Denpasar airport at holiday end.
We were greeted by the charming owner Nilesh, who introduced us to Wayan, Kadek and Rian and enjoyed lemon scented flannels and a delicious welcome drink. Nilesh then handed us over to the laid back but highly efficient property manager Putra who showed us around this 4 bedroom villa and gave us the house mobile with the numbers of all those we may need during our stay or for emergencies. Wayan prepared food for us on numerous occasions including all breakfasts and any requests we may have and shopped for the food too. They all made us feel welcome and couldn't do enough for us. Kadek and Rian were continually making the place look beautiful and took great delight in the company of our small grandchildren.
All the rooms are lovely, master bedroom had the bathroom shower open to the sky something I will sorely miss. Beautiful pool. The whole area has security staff for this little group of villas. Key to go through the magic door to the market and onto the beach just a minute of two from the pool.
My thanks to them all and book with complete confidence here to have a fabulous stay. TOP CLASS++++++++++++++++++++
title: A class act from start to finish

text: I had such a beautiful stay! Loved the pool; the incredible outdoor shower and breakfast of Nasi Goreng each morning made by Made!! Felt like a queen. Thank you Villa Seriska and the wonderful staff. The location is perfect also - right near the main street and brilliant yoga centre called 'prana spa'. the pool though - incredible.
title: beautiful stay and upgrade!

text: Last month I took my extended family for a two week long vacation in Bali and stayed in Villa Seriska Dua in Sanur. After our visit, I would definitely recommend Villa Seriska to any family looking for a spacious private villa and first class service. The staff were so helpful and we always felt safe with our two young ones playing around the villa - they even installed a pool fence around the large pool! Also a relaxing time for the adults - as a large family we spent a lot of time hanging out at the villa and wandering around Sanur which we love, although the driver was available for us if we wanted to take a longer trip. We also met Nilesh, the owner, and Putra, the villa manager, who were helpful is suggesting places we could go or accommodating our needs. For any travellers looking to take a trip to Bali, we would definitely recommend Villa Seriska as a clean, private and luxurious accomodation. Definitely staying with them next time we come to Bali!
title: Definitely staying with them next time we come to Bali!

text:
As you can see, I and my family have given Villa Serika Satu five stars…. I wonder if a sixth is available? 
What can be said about the little bit of paradise that is the Villa Seriska, that isn’t obvious from the pictures, video and description that the affable owner  Nilesh provides on the Villa website and the websites of other sites, such as HomeAway? The peace and tranquillity promised is apparent from the moment we as a family opened the door to this beautiful haven; the comfort of the rooms, furniture and facilities is matched by their cleanliness. The promises made on the websites are delivered … and then some! The Villa Seriska website assures prospective guests a luxurious “home from home” and this is amply provided, with all the little touches that make a stay at the Villa a complete joy.
No, the one thing that cannot be conveyed from the portrayal in the pictures and video, is the quality of the staff. Their friendly, thorough, yet unobtrusive hard work ensures that a stay at Villa Seriska rises from a perfectly comfortable and relaxing vacation to a warm and welcoming one. My family and I, cannot thank, Wayan, Kadek, Rian, Thomas, Uni and Putra enough. Whether it was the wonderful cooking, the driving, or the general help and organising, these were always done to the highest standards, and always with a smile. It is a long way from the UK to Bali, but if we the Williams family have a chance in the future to return, there is only one place that we would come back to – Villa Seriska. Thank you all. 
Diolch yn fawr i chi gyd am wyliau rhagorol!
title: Six Stars Available?

text: We stayed in Villa Seriska Sanur Dua, as there are two villas in Sanur. Came to Bali with a group of friends for a relaxing week and were not disappointed! The villa is very spacious and has a lovely design with a large pool deck and garden. Villa is also open-plan so you can also drift from the bedroom to the pool areas very easily and is perfect for a larger group. Staff were very friendly and always smiling, managing to accomodate our every need! We spent a fair amount of time relaxing by the pool but also took a few trips to Ubud and did some other activities, luckily we had a good tour guide and driver with Thomas, who was very patient showing us around as for some of us this was our first trip to Bali. Villa was clean, quiet and well-maintained - we were even given a villa mobile phone so we could contact the helpful manager Putra! Overall we felt very well taken care of staying at Villa Seriska, we also met Nilesh, the owner, personally - this made us feel more at home and anything we needed was provided for us, also made us feel it was a better choice to chose a villa over a hotel because of the personal level of service! Must also mention the food was great, we actually ended up eating at the villa most nights because chef Wayan produces restaurant-quality food, both Asian and Western so we had a great choice for those who weren't too comfortable with Asian food.  Overall, we spent a wonderful week being pampered at Villa Seriska and would highly recommend to anyone visiting Bali - we ourselves are already planning a return trip ASAP!
title: Already planning our trip back!

text: We had our flight cancelled due to volcanic eruption and found ourselves stranded at Denpasar airport after a family holiday with children and grandchildren. We searched the Internet for any last minute availability for one night as we were unsure how long the airport closure would last, and were pleased to find Villa Seriska Dua was available. We had previously stayed at Villa Seriska Satu also in Sanur and had a wonderful stay there and were reassured that the standard would be good. When we arrived at the villa we were delighted with the property and it will be a difficult decision in future choosing which property to stay at. Although Seriska 2 is not so close to the beach it is also a very stylish villa and has a slightly larger garden. Facilities at Seriska Dua are first class and the staff are outstanding, nothing is too much trouble. Both properties can be highly recommend whether for a group of family or friends or for couples seeking a spacious and romantic luxury hideaway.
title: Last minute Luxury

text: The proprietor of Villa Seriska - there are now 2 villas - pays attention to detail and listens to his customers. A customer told him that he needed deck-beds for all the guests. The villa sleeps 8, and there are 8 deck-beds by the pool. His aim is to please his customers, and many of them (like us) keep coming back for more. We stayed in Villa Seriska 2 this time around. It has 4 bedrooms, all with ensuite bathrooms. While its location in Sanur is a bit of a walk to the main strip (about 15 minutes perhaps), they had bicycles and a car and driver on standby if we needed to use them. The main strip has a supermarket so you can get your supplies. There is also good shopping and some great restaurants serving food from international and local menus. Try Massimo for Italian and Cafe Batujimbar for local fare. But the service staff at the villa serve up a fabulous barbecue (seafood, meat, just ask) in the gazebo by the pool. We had that on two nights of our stay. Yum. Rooms and the villa were well cleaned everyday. We also had daily massages by the pool - you can get the phone number from the villa staff. The masseusses come en masse and massage everyone all together. If you want a hassle-free, chill holiday, this is the way to go.
title: Lovely, well-managed villa!

text: Villa Seriska Dua in Sanur-Warm,friendly and efficient staff.Good in-house chef who makes the best "sambal mentah" and barbecues.A soft spoken and careful driver on our beck and call.A nice sized villa that housed our family of 10 adults very comfortably.Rain showers with excellent water pressure.Lovely landscape and pool.Daily massages by the pool at very reasonable rates.Altogether,a wonderful and very relaxing 5 days holiday!
title: Great family holiday spot!

text:
The 3 bedroom- Villa Seriska in Seminyak was beautiful. The staff were perfection. Putra who looked after myself and my family was absolutely beautiful and was superb in his nature & being so helpful. 

The housekeepers were pure gems. 

We did visit the Orphanage which Villa Seriska supports to play with the children. 

This was truly blessed. 

I did leave them a generous gesture so I do hope this can take them a little further with the great work they do for those cute little angels. The villa is spacious, the outside shower is bliss. It's clean, aircon is strong and in every room. The pool is the perfect size. 

The villa was absolutely perfect. There is nothing I would change. I will definitely visit again.

Angelique Torcasio

Melbourne Australia
title: Amazing!!

text: Villa Seriska Seminyak. Putra, Nilesh & the housekeeping staff were all awesome & attentive. Great spot, great villa, great plunge pool. Quiet & private. We were given a mobile phone, maps & lots of local information.Secure and well serviced. Own computer to use and well set-up kitchen (coffee machine etc). Perfect location for boutique shopping, eating, Bali deli for supplies. Beach 15 minutes walk away but plenty of transport. Organised a great deal to Nusa Lembongen and delivered our extra luggage to Sanur on our return. Absolutely recommend this place.
title: Our needs well catered for

text: It seems there are two villa seriskas (satu and dua). I stayed at the single storey one in Sanur. It was okay, but nothing fantastic. The staff were unobtrusive as is apparently the policy, but we found the service pretty cold, as was the pool. The showers were appalling, the water just trickled out and the open air bathrooms meant the kids and ourselves had no escape from mosquitoes at all. There is simply no way to stop them coming in through the open air bathrooms, and they are attracted to all the water surrounding the bath tubs I think. We were all covered in bites despite layering in aeroguard and putting coils everywhere. Beware that the driver at your service is a complete rip off. They charged us $60 US for what ended up being half a day. For that price we could have caught taxis all over the island. Its daylight robbery to pay that much on an island where transport is famously cheap. Luckily we only made the mistake once. Its easy enough to walk to the corner and grab transport. We also did not get access to the washing machine mentioned either, although laundry service was cheap enough. The villas location is great and handy access to the beach, but there are nicer villas around now that we have been there and looked around. Many people mention Nilesh in their review and as he was not there when we were there, maybe this had something to do with our average stay. Sanur is beautiful and we will no doubt go back, but not to this villa.
title: Not bad

owner_response.text:
Thank you for your comments.

As explained during our pre-arrival email exchanges, I am sorry that i was not personally in Bali during your stay with us. 

I would like to address the points made in your comments as follows:

We request our staff to be as unobtrusive as possible because this is what our guests prefer. I am sorry that you found them to be cold. This is the opposite to the comments from most of our other guests - as you will see from the other guest reviews. 

With regard to the swimming pool, like all other pools in Bali, it is not heated. However, it is in direct sunlight most of the day and with the tropical temperatures, our other guests have not had a problem even swimming in the evenings.

I was surprised by your comment about our showers as we have never had a problem with this at this villa. I checked with my staff and believe that you experience low pressure when once they were filling up the pool at the same time … this was explained to a member of your group. 

We do have two en-suite semi-open Balinese style bathrooms at this villa. Both these bathrooms have solid doors to the bedrooms. Our other guests have not had a problem with mosquitoes, but i will check and address this when i return to Bali in two days time.

We have a washing machine for guest use near the kitchen area. I am sorry if this was not shown to you during your stay.

The daily charge (8 hours) for our private minivan to accommodated your group of 8 guests, including fuel and driver/guide, is USD 60. This is the standard charge in Bali for this size of vehicle. We inform guests in advance of our charges. Some private operators may charge less but in many cases will charge extra for fuel. I understand that you decided to use our minivan for approx. 6 hours for your shopping and lunch trip to Seminyak. For information, two return taxis (to accommodate 8 people) would cost approx. USD 44 from Sanur to Seminyak, excluding side trips for shopping. 

I am sorry that part of our service did not meet your expectation, but i am glad that you liked our villa location and Sanur.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Staying last week with some work colleagues for a (relaxed) business trip, we found the Sanur villa online and it was wonderful ... very clean, big, airy and I loved that the outdoor area had enough deck chairs for the amount of people the villa catered for - I have stayed at other villas where this is not the case!

There was an amazing gazebo outside with a large 10 person outdoor table and chairs, ceiling fans and lighting ... was a wonderful place for a full day's meeting, surrounded by the lovely garden.  The pool was a good size for the villa.

All of the staff were very friendly and helpful, daily breakfast was made for us along with lunch one day, and our airport transferred were included which is always handy when you arrive!

I would have no hesitation recommending this villa, and will definitely have it on my list to visit again on my next trip.
title: Villa Seriska Dua (Sanur) ... fantastic villa, so much space!

text: FANTASTIC!!!....great location, close to beach & shops, clean, friendly staff, great chef, beautiful rooms, highly recommend!!! Great for families or a group of friends!!! Enough rooms & space for everyone....bikes supplied, great for shopping & a casual ride along the beach...can't speak more highly of this beautiful accommodation!!
title: BRILLIANT!!!

text: My partner & I stayed at Villa Seriska in Seminyak for 3 days. As always Nilesh & his staff made our stay very comfortable & stress free. We stayed in the one bedroom pool villa. The villa was very spacious & clean. Highly recommend :)
title: Amazing !

text: just had very short stay at Villa Seriska with my colleagues. Very nice and warm welcome from the staffs. Just a perfect private big space to have a wonderful and relaxing weekend getaway with family or colleagues.
title: Perfect getaway

text:
My friends and I stayed at Villa Seriska for 3 days. The villa was big and spacious, the pool was always kept warm enough, and the staff were attentive and hospitable. 

However, there were several power trips on the upper floors of the villa for the first two days, which forced my friends and I (all 7 of us) to eventually move the beds to the master room on the first floor so that we could sleep. We were already warned about the power tripping issues from overcharging of cellphones, so we had consciously limited our charging of phones to one at a time, or sometimes none at all, but this didn't help the situation. We were a bit upset that the staff kept telling us to not charge our phones to fix the situation despite the fact that we kept insisting that we were not doing so. In the end, the owner of the villa got an electrician to fix the situation on the afternoon of day 2 (which worked but was, of course, rather late) and did not charge us for the extra bed we got, but we couldn't help but feel that this was too little too late. 

There was also a persistent wifi problem which caused us to be unable to connect on most times we tried, causing some of us to throw in the towel and buy local 3G SIM cards to contact our loved ones. 

Overall, quite a pity as the villa was really great in all other respects.
title: Great but plagued with power/wifi issues

text: Villa Seriska made for a perfect Bali holiday for me and my family. It was a wonderful villa, run by a hospitable and attentive staff, managed by a charming couple, and gave us a welcome respite from the busyness of our lives back home (which we really never wanted to return to during our lovely holiday!). Arriving at the villa, we were greeted by Nilesh and Audrey, who were very accommodating, showing us around the place, helping us get our bearings, and giving us great recommendations for our stay. The rooms were well-designed, clean, and homely. The bathrooms were incredible, and I swear that's not hyperbole (you have to see it to believe it - the bathtubs themselves are submerged in a gorgeous pond, replete with fish and flora). The villa staff were friendly and made us feel as if we were at a new home. Honestly did not want to leave, and am gutted that I'm writing this review in Hong Kong, and not in Villa Seriska in Bali!
title: Wonderful stay at Villa Seriska

text:
It was our first time visit to Bali and we have been well taken care of by Nilesh, Audrey and their team.

Villa seriska sanur is a gorgeous private villa located in the heart of sanur. It's only few mins walk to beach, restaurants, spas and shops so finding something to keep you entertained is never a problem. 

The location of the villa is very convenient, however the minute you enter the compound you feel at peace with tranquil water features blocking out any outside noise. The villa is very private with high surrounding fence and grounds are lush and well maintained. The villa itself was tastefully furnished and we'll kept. The moment you walk in to this luxury villa, you will absolutely fall in love with it, the sounds of the water feature, stunning private pool, shaded sun loungers, fish pond, all of these provide a peaceful and relaxing atmosphere. 
The rooms of the villa are gorgeous, the decor was beautiful and tasteful. All rooms have both fan and air-conditioning . Every room is fully equipped, and we loved having all the light options. Also whole villa it's wireless covered.

All the staffs in villa are  difentily provided world class hospitality.
They are very attentive and willing to handle any request you may have. The room is always clean when you return, there always fresh towel available, and also the staff will put out mosquito coils for the outdoor bathroom areas and close the sleeping area. You really couldn't ask more! One last thing to mention, villa has 24hrs security guard, you will fell very safe here!

I have to say villa seriska it's a fictitious land of peace. I would highly recommend villa seriska to other travellers.
title: Bali paradise- Villa Seriska

text: We loved the Vila the moment we entered this villa. And it is huge! and super clean :) we had an unexpected guest with us for the trip and the people of villa were accommodating of that fact :) so we had a pleasant & peaceful stay. The location of this villa is very good with all the eateries around us. A very good Indian restaurant - Queen was also very close, so it was very convenient with our parents :) the beach was also very close. I would recommend this place to everyone who wants to have a peaceful time in seminyak!
title: Very Beautiful & Spacious Villa

text: I wish to express my heartfelt thanks to all the staff at Villa Seriska. My family of 7 had a great time during our recent visit. Service and the food was superb!! My kids love you guys too. My younger son celebrated his 5th birthday on our last night and the first person whom he gave the cake was his favorite "Uncle Thomas" ! :) My Eldest son's favourite is no other than Chef Wayan, who will accommodate his ice-cream and spaghetti requests any time any day. Also not forgetting the gals who made our rooms so we come back to a clean place to rest in. Thank you all very much and we will not hesitate to come again!
title: 9 Fantastic Days in Villa Seriska

text: Many thanks to everyone at Villa Seriska. My family all had a wonderful time and enjoyed every second of our two weeks stay. Amazing location, beautiful gardens and the most wonderful and cheerful staff. We could't ask for more !!!! We have stayed at many places in Bali before but the Villa Seriska and the staff made this such a relaxing, fun and memorable time. We hope to return again one day soon!! Wishing everyone (staff and future guests) a great time full of great memories (just like we had). Many, many, thanks Villa Seriska
title: Brilliant

text:
Our little family of 3 stayed at this wonderful, wonderful villa in Oct 2014 and we really enjoyed ourselves thoroughly there... especially our 2 year old daughter who can't get enough of the private pool. It was a really good sized pool. She spent hours rowing her little float boat in it.

The villa itself was tastefully furnished and well kept. There's a turndown service every night and the staff would put on the mosquito coils and repellents around the villa. 

The staff are really nice. Special mention to Putra who welcomed us on our first day and gave us a lot of info of the area. Really approacable and will always be there when you need anything. The villa provides a handphone so if you need anything (in-villa spa, in-villa meals, tours) you can just contact the staff. Putra arranged our delicious in-villa lunch and also my super relaxing in-villa spa.

Location wise, can't get any better.. lots of eateries nearby. Close to main road yet quiet and private. Short taxi ride to the beach. 

In short, we felt like royalty here. Thanks to Nilesh and his wonderful staff.
title: In short, we felt like royalty...

photos.caption: Our 2 year old can't get enough of the pool

text: Thank you for a great two days! We were so glad that we found Villa Seriska for our stay in Sanur. Great location, great villa and great staff ! We loved the peace and tranquility of the villa for our honeymoon and we were so sad to leave. Next time we will come back with more people so enjoy the great space. Breakfast was delicious and massages relaxing. Staff was very accommodating to our needs. Hope to be back one day!
title: Great Stop on our Honeymoon

text:
I took my family (2 adults and 2 children) to stay for 6 days at villa Seriska. 
I have stayed at many top end villas in Bali and although this is not the top end it was a delight to stay in.
It was a perfect villa for our family. The villa was very clean and tidy and the location was very good. The main thing that shone was the level of service with the staff being so wonderful. They are so friendly and nothing is a bother. The staff here are the best I have had at any villa stay in Bali. The owner met us on the morning of our second day and is a lovely person. The boys fell in love with the owners dog which is beautiful and always happy for a friendly pat. 
I was ill for part of my stay due to a poor eating choice of my own and the staff were so help full and genuinely concerned and often offered to help in any way. 
The villa here is one of the quietest I have stayed at in bali up a private no thru street with no road noise
I can not recommend more highly this villa and its a perfect spot to base yourself and a great place for family's with such wonderful service why would you go past it?
(If you have small children do note the pool is not fenced)
title: Short stay

text:
We have just returned from a week holiday at Villa Seriska. We had a wonderful time. We were in 2 families and we were very pleased with the amenities, accomodation and service. The villa is beautiful and is in an excellent location, very close to the beach, restaurants and shops. Nilesh, the owner, did an amazing job from the time we inquired about the villa (about 4 minths prior to our trip) until the day we checked out. We would definitely return if our travels take us to Bali again, and recommend to anyone looking for an amazing experience.
Nilesh, thank you very much for providing an excellent service. Your house is beautiful and it was a pleasure meeting you.
Gisele S.
title: Wonderful holiday at Villa Seriska Sanur

text:
We recently had a weeklong stay at Villa Seriska Satu in Seminyak.  We opted to stay at a Villa this vacation rather than a luxury hotel.  It was a great change of pace for us.  Having similar amenities to a luxury hotel yet with the added living space was of great benefit for a family of five.

Nilesh has provided top notch service in making his customers feel welcome. His staff including Putra, Made, Manik, Thomas, and others made sure all of our needs were met...especially with our last minute requests!

The location is convenient to restaurants, shops, and spas so finding something to keep you entertained is never a problem.  A driver is available for day trips.  We were able to visit areas north of Seminyak and down towards the southern part of the island as well.  It is well worth having a driver available for these day excursions.  Each driver was able to show us highlights at each stop and Putra even was gracious enough to act as a tour guide at one of the temples for us.

If you are considering to stay at a Villa, I would not hesitate to consider contacting Nilesh at Villa Seriska.  His staff is remarkable and they will help make your stay a memorable one.
title: Wonderful Family Holiday at Villa Seriska Seminyak

text: I found it hard to leave the house! With the lovely staff, our visit was heavenly. The driver was waiting for us at the airport (even after we took an hour to get through immigrations). The villa staff expertly prepared our meals (even gave us a cooking class) and cleaned for us throughout our stay. The wifi was fast so I could still do a little bit of work while I was here.
title: Can't wait to come back

photos.caption: Dinner comprised of gado gado, pork rendang and satay.

text:
I visited Bali last week along with my wife and friends. We had booked the three bedroom villa Seriska Satu in Seminyak. From the moment we stepped inside the villa until the moment we left for the airport, the stay was truly amazing. Everything is perfect in the villa. The beds are very comfortable and the sleep quality is very good. The whole villa is very tastefully designed and is very functional as well. The pool area is the highlight of the villa and you can spend your whole day just lazying around. The villa is perfect for big groups travelling together.

Just one small suggestion- there should be a trash can in the pool area. Apart from that, everything is spot on.
title: Review of Villa Seriska Satu

text: The best choice for those are looking for hotel in Bali. Villa located just few minutes to Sauna beach by bike,and it had just provided some bikes.Rooms size are great,especially the master room.The rooms were all clean and made us comfortable.There were skylights inside the bathroom. We could ask the chef cooking Real Indonesian BBQ to the villa chat around the swimming pool and stars at night.Food was perfect!That was so warm to enjoy family happiness.Otherwise,we could ask the driver to take us to any attractions.And the driver was patience to help us travel arrangements, and provides a lot of good advice. Villa located just few minutes to Sauna beach by bike,and it had just provided some bikes.At last,all the staff are very polite and helpful.We all love the villa.we will revisit next time for a longer period and recommend to friends.
title: Cozy villa

text:
Villa Seriska (www.seriska.com) is a two story (complete with safety gates), three bedroom villa in the heart of Seminyak Beach. The villas has a small private pool, complete with a pool fence (a big safety bonus for this mom). When I began looking at villas these safety fences were available, but there was always an extra charge (around $25usd per day). Villa Seriska provided both of these at no extra charge.  They were both good quality and in proper working order.

The location of the villa is on the end of a quite cup-de-sac that is an easy walk (even with small children) to great food, shopping, and most importantly to a mom-a grocery store, pharmacy, and liquor store. My husband and I were able to run on the sidewalks every day, never running down a busy or unsafe street.  It is a very easy 15 minute walk to the beach, again, down safe streets. Also, there is the option of cabs or the car that can be rented from the villa.

Thomas is the driver we were able to hire through the villa. He was with us from the time we collected our bags at the airport until he dropped us off to come home. We were able to get a medium size van, complete with car seats for both boys, for a very reasonable rate. Thomas met us at the airport, helped us with our bags, and helped plan the tours we wanted to see. He was very knowledgable about travel time to certain destinations as well as the best time to go. Thomas also took us to an amazing restaurant on the beach where we had a great meal while watching the sun go down. An added bonus you could watch the planes land at the airport across the water, so my older son was sitting on the beach, watching boats and airplanes! It was a perfect evening for a three-year-old boy.

Thomas was only the beginning of the great staff provided by Villa Seriska. We were also provided with a chef, daily housekeeping, and a villa manager. We had breakfast in the villa every morning (not having to get everyone dressed and out the door for breakfast-win). The selection of food was wonderful and everything was complemented with fresh fruit and wonderful Indonisean coffee. The staff entertained my older son while I fed the baby, showing him how to feed the fish in the pond and even letting him help scramble eggs. What a great stress-free way to start the day. We also had dinner one night in the villa. Because it was a special occasion, a family birthday, I asked if we could have dinner prepared for my son first and ours after he was put to bed. The staff had no problem accommodating this request. They also cooked on a grill outside and in another villa, so as not to make too much noise while I was getting the boys to bed. The staff set up a great Balinese BBQ. My only regret is that we did not dine-in more.

I would be remise if I did not mention the villa owner, Nelish. He was hands on throughout our stay, stopping by to check on us and providing some great restaurant recommendations. His dog, Monster, was a big hit with everyone on the trip as well. We also had a slight medical concern during our stay and without question Nelish dropped everything and drove me to the emergency room.
title: Amazing Villa/Amazing Trip

text:
I rarely write a review on Trip Advisor although I consider my wife and I to be travelers who appreciate local culture, great food, exceptional service and to have a high expectation of enjoyment once we have planned our trip.

This particular vacation to Bali was planned by my Son and his Wife who live in Bangkok.  As the travel to BKK is such an effort from the States we were happy to have a side trip with their family and we were quite intrigued regarding Bali.  To get to my point, I do not intend to go into all the great things about Bali as it is a wonderful experience that we enjoyed so very much.

However, the best part of the trip was staying at Villa Seriska!  Like everyone else the key factors in choosing Villa Seriska were the quality reputation and location.  While these two factors were A+ in my opinion, the real story is the staff.  We took full advantage of their services of a driver and meal preparation for us.  We started every morning with a wonderful breakfast prepared for us (I recommend the Indonesian breakfast) which was an event in itself.  The food was fresh and expertly prepared and the Chef even let my three year-old Grandson lend a hand.  My family surprised me one night with a fantastic dinner prepared by the staff for my Birthday and I only regret we didn't have other evening meals prepared for us as it was the best meal on the trip.

I also have to comment on the driver provided for us for a nominal charge.  Thomas turned out to be an outstanding tour guide who took us to temples, rice terraces, a coffee plantation, etc., that made our trip perfect.

In closing I can only say I can't more highly recommend Villa Seriska.  Without a doubt it was the best lodging experience i possibly haveever enjoyed.I truly wish we could have them as our hosts wherever we travel as the best part of our trip to Bali was Nilesh and his wonderful staff!
title: Perfect Choice!

text:
AMAZING - VILLA SERISKA DUA, SANUR

The villa has offered my family of 9 comfort, fun and security! The service was impeccable and the rooms are all very clean and spacious. Our favourite was of course the private pool! We could spend hours just wading around the pool and chatting with our families. Room service was always punctual. We never had to deal with unkept bedsheets or wet towels. Everything is always promptly changed and well maintained. Thank you for giving us such previous memories to hold on to for the rest of our lives. Oh yes! Thanks for all the wonderful advice and tips on places to eat and shop. 

P.S. The owner is one hell of a friendly guy who has our needs in mind.
title: Amazing place for all types of travellers

text:
Villa Seriska Satu is a gorgeous private villa in the heart of Sanur. It is a short (2min) stroll to the beach via a private alley and then through the market. Or, if you want shopping then walk 50 metres in the other direction and you're on the main shopping/restaurant/tourist street. The minute you enter the compound you feel at peace with tranquil water features blocking out any outside noise. The pool is as amazing as the villa. We had 8 adults and 2 children staying and we all had plenty of space. This villa was definitely the highlight of our two week stay in Bali.

The staff are helpful and will do anything to assist you.

We would have given this villa a 5 out of 5 rating but unfortunately the food, whilst good, was always served later than the agreed times in the mornings. This was a bit annoying when we wanted to get out and do stuff early. However, it must have been hard for the chef catering with a larger party than normal. I think we could have managed the time problem by calling the manager to sort it out but we were on holiday and couldn't be bothered.
title: Lovely villa in central location close to beach and shops

text:
First let me say, this review is only to serve to as a warning as we were not the right fit for the type of people that should stay here. 

The villa itself is very nice looking. The stay itself was...awkward.

-When we arrived the pool lounge chairs were set up with towels nicely rolled and placed on each one with a few in the kitchen. That was the last time we saw those towels. After they were used and placed in the bin to be replaced, they were never to be seen again. After the first swim, we had to go out of the villa to the garage in the alley and seek someone to bring us towels. We couldn't find anyone so we had to call the manager to ask for someone to bring them to us. 
-The villas do not have a reception/management office or area. So if you need anything while you are there, you have to call the manager's cell and then he has to send someone to your villa. Unfortunately, when they arrive they are not told what your request was, so then you have to explain to them and wait again for them to bring you whatever you need. Just a silly waste of time, in my opinion.
-You can order breakfast through the villa, but there are only two options: American and Indonesian set meals. The website/reviews said you only have to pay for ingredients but the price was a set $10usd per person, which to me seems like more than the cost of the ingredients based on the amount of food they provide. You have to order 24 hours in advance, which is hard when you arrive at 2pm for check in and want breakfast for the next day. Thus, we had no choice but to have all Indonesian breakfasts. We set the time for 6am as the whole group was getting ready to leave for early tour. The chef comes into your villa (without knocking, using their own key) and makes the breakfast in your kitchen. It was VERY awkward as they did not tell us they were there and it was a villa of three late 20s females. It was unnerving to wake up and find someone in your villa that you did not let in.
-The serving of the breakfast itself was very awkward.  The chef waited for 45 minutes for us to come down and sit at the table to be served (like children?). We told the chef it was okay to just put the food on the table when it was ready, as we were all rushing to get ready to leave for a morning tour and wanted to eat as we were up and about. He just stood there and waited, serving the fruit first. He waitied for us to finish the fruit, so he could bring out the main-- did not say this, just stood and watched, so we had to assume that's what it was. It was very, very awkward trying to explain to him that he didn't need to stand there and wait for us to finish each item before bringing the next. He didn't understand at all, but finally told us he had to leave to go fix breakfast for another villa (thank goodness). The food was average at best - we really love Indonesian food but this was quite bland. Maybe he thought he was doing us a favor?
-The master bedroom is downstairs with two doors - one going to the bathroom which is exposed to the out doors and one to the kitchen. Only one of those doors can be locked from inside the room.  So, the main bedroom can be accessed from the exterior villa area, which is absolutely terrifying for a young woman staying in the downstairs room alone. Eventually I just stayed upstairs with the rest of the guests because I could not bear to be down there with no safety lock.

The villa is decent, but definitely not for us. If you do not expect privacy within the villa and enjoy being watched and waited on in that way, this is absolutely the right choice for you.
title: Awkward stay at Villa Seriska Seminyak...

owner_response.text:
Thank you for the feedback about your stay at our villa. 

We would like to address the points you raised as follows:

Six pool towels were placed in the villa at check-in time, although there were only 3 guests in your group. Upon request, a further 3 pool towels were placed in the villa. You are correct that, as a private villa, we do not have a reception desk. Therefore, we give our guests a local mobile phone so they can contact us at any time. We also have staff inside our villa compound 24 hours a day: Housekeeping staff from 7am to 7pm and security staff from 5pm to 7am. 

We offer the services of a chef within our rates for all our direct bookings. The chef will make breakfast, lunch or dinner, as required, and our guests only pay for the ingredients used. We request at least 12 hours (ideally 24 hours) notice for food order so our chef can purchase fresh ingredients. Unless requested not to do so, the chef and serving staff enter the kitchen/dining room area about 30 minutes before the requested time for breakfast in order to make the necessary preparations. In your case they arrived at 5.30am for your breakfast request at 6am. We are sorry if there was any miscommunication regarding this matter. 

Normally our guests like to have their breakfast hot and freshly prepared, so the main course is prepared when our guests are having their fruits and tea/coffee. We are sorry that our staff misunderstood your request to prepare all the food as soon as possible and leave the villa. By the way, we have a sign on the main door which the guests can use if they require privacy. If this sign is placed on the door, our staff will not enter the villa.

As you know, your booking was made via an agent. Due to the discount rate offered, no breakfast or chef service was included in the rate. This was explained to you on arrival and therefore the breakfast was chargeable at US$ 10 per adult.

All the doors to the master bedroom have a lock. There is a lock on the master bathroom door, but unfortunately the key was not in the lock as our guests do not normally lock this door to the bathroom from the inside. If you had requested that this door should be locked, we would have been happy to give you the key.

We are glad that you liked our villa but we are sorry that some aspects of our service were not to your liking. Our staff do their very best to provide a high quality, personalised service to all our guests as confirmed in the other guest reviews.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
This was the first time our family of 4 and my mom travelled to Bali and we picked Villa Seriska Dua because of the great reviews from Tripadvisor.  

The villa is located at end of a quiet cul-de-sac and about 5 minutes walk to the edge of the hustle and bustle of Seminyak.  If you wish do not wish to walk, there are plenty of taxis on the streets and are very inexpensive.

The villa is very private with high surrounding fence/wall and the grounds are lush and well maintained.  The sounds of the water features and fish in the pond provide a peaceful and relaxing atmosphere. The pool is small but offers cool relief during the day when it is quite hot and humid. 

The inside of the villa is clean and tidy.   The kitchen provided the essentials if you prefer to prepare some meals yourself and we had the Chef prepare for us a few delicious meals and we were always stuffed!  The bedrooms were well appointed and the mattresses were very comfortable.  The master bathroom had a fantastic outdoor shower.  

The best thing about our stay is that we loved the staff.   What a wonderful way for our family to spend our holiday and for the Seriska team to expose us to the culture on our first visit to Bali. It was so memorable and worry free. Thank you so much to Putra, Made, Thomas, Niluh, Wayan, Manik and Nilesh for providing us with first rate personalized service. 

We look forward to returning back to Bali in the very near future.
title: Villa Seriska Seminyak Dua...nothing short of amazing!

text:
This is an undiscovered jewel and a MUST if you like space, appreciate friendly service, want to relax in comfort and enjoy Bali!  The property is beautifully and lovingly maintained and the listing description and photos are entirely accurate.  The staff are a delight and the owner provided excellent customer service.  We would definitey recommend this property to others and have already done so.  
We particualry enjoy the area of Sanur and the property location as it was quiet, yet the beach, restuarants, shops were in easy walking distance.  We would recommend that guests enjoy what Sanur has to offer and our three pre-teen children enjoyed paddling and sailing in the lagoon reef.  A family highlight was going to Surf School for 5 days and visiting the Elephant Park.
You will not be disappointed in choosing this stunning villa and all it has to offer.
title: Be spoilt in stunning villa!

owner_response.text:
Thank you and your wonderful family for choosing Villa Seriska. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your holiday in Bali at our villa … it was our pleasure to organise all your tours and the kids activities. We are also happy that you definitely recommend our villa!

The Villa Seriska Team
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Yet another wonderful stay at Villa Seriska ... the pool has to be the children's favourite, it is hard to get them out! They always ask "when are we going to the villa with the big pool!". It has been a very long and fun summer for us so thank you for helping to make it perfect. We look forward to hopefully repeating it again next year ... well, that's is what the children are hoping :)
title: Perfect!

owner_response.text:
As our regular guests, we are glad to hear that you had another wonderful stay with us and consider Villa Seriska as your summer home! Our staffs consider you as part of our extended family. See you and your family next year!

The Villa Seriska Team

text:

text: First and foremost, I would like to thank Nilesh (villa owner) and his wonderful team of staff for making our stay at Seriska so wonderful. We simply love the privacy and the personal service and attention given by them. We have our very own private chef (Made) who served us a hearty American breakfast and a driver (Thomas) to take us around. Putra (Villa manager) is very friendly, speaks good English and very accommodating to all our requests. Felt like 5 pampered princesses! A thick manual painstakingly prepared by Nilesh provides useful guide on how to spend your holiday in Bali. The 3 bedroom villa is close to the hustle and bustle of Seminyak town but the minute you entered the villa, it is so calm and peaceful. The only sound we hear is the crowing rooster! The villa is beautifully decorated with Balinese statues and art. The villa is spacious and very open where you could see beautiful landscapes surrounding the villa from the living to the dining to the kitchen area. The master bedroom on the ground floor overlooks the private swimming pool. For those of you who can’t live without the internet, free WIFI is available and large flat TV screen for entertainment. If you like to shop and dine, shops and restaurants are within walking distance.We have taken lots of photos during our stay at the villa and all my friends in Facebook are very impressed. We highly recommend this wonderful villa if you are planning a holiday to Bali.
title: Wonderful stay at Seriska Villa

text: My stay at Villa Seriska in March 2011 was really wonderful and very relaxing. The villa is beautifully decorated and has everything you need for a relaxing stay including the beautiful swimming pool. The location is great as well as Seminyak Beach and the shops & restaurants are not far away at all but the villa itself is very peaceful. The staff were amazing and made me feel right at home from the very minute I arrived at Bali airport where Thomas was there to collect me. The manager Putra is extremely friendly and helpful and nothing was too much for him and his team. His English is very good as well. I’ve had a fantastic time seeing Bali and I also fulfilled a lifelong dream to swim with dolphins with Bali Dolphins in Serangan. It was fabulous!
