text:
We stayed at the Villa Seriska in Sanur for 10 nights in October 2010. My husband and I and our teenager had been to Bali a number of times before, but our friends, with their teenage daughter and two under five, had not been before. 
We arrived at the airport to have Thomas meet us, and although we didn't get to the villa until about 10pm, the owner, Nilesh, was there to say hi and make sure we had everything we needed. He was also there to say goodbye when we left. The villa was better than it presented on the website. It's tucked away in a quiet lane off the main street of Sanur, and close to the beach and restaurants, and markets. The villa's very private, and surprisingly spacious. Having breakfast cooked for us every morning was amazing. The pool and the adjoining bale were luxurious. We even had a birds nest in our outdoor bathroom, and were able to watch the baby and parents each time we had a shower, until the baby flew away! Our friends’ daughter turned 14 while we were there, and we arranged for the staff to cook an amazing dinner for us in the villa that night. The staff organized a beautiful cake for us, and we all had a fabulous evening..
On the days when we felt like exploring, the staff organised transport and advice, from where to have shoes made, to where to find a doctor in Denpasar when my husband put his neck out. 
Staying at Villa Seriska allowed us all to relax totally and feel pampered, which is a rare thing. All the staff  were wonderful.  We are planning our next trip already, and we just arrived home today! We’re would definitely stay there again.
title: We loved Villa Seriska Sanur

text: We recently stayed at this villa for 8 nights in Sep/Oct 2010 and recommend it for anyone looking to stay in Sanur. My family (2 adults and 2 children) and our friends (2 adults and 2 children) booked this villa in the hope of spoiling ourselves a little. The villa has plenty of room with spacious bedrooms, a beautiful pool and a large living area so you don't feel like you are living in each others pockets. The staff were tremendous making us feel very welcome, with the owner Nilesh happy to accommodate us with any requests/needs. The villa itself is in a great location, just off one of the main roads in Sanur. Close to the beach with your own access way to the beach. Down at the beach there are plenty of restaurants and shopping and places to get a massage. You certainly don't go hungry in the morning with plenty to eat for breakfast and a good selection to suit most tastes. The property was very very clean and we wouldn't hesitate to go back again in the future. The pictures on the web probably don't do it justice, and Nilesh was happy to answer any questions promptly prior to our arrival and even after our arrival. The only concern I would have is the kids can feel a little remote from the adults bedroom as the bedrooms are separated by a bathroom. You can't leave the bathroom door open as it is susceptible to mosquitoes. But depending on the age of your kids this can be a good thing! Our kids were aged between 7-10 years so it didn't present to many problems. On the whole a fantastic holiday, the villa amenities/facilities were excellent and its location fantastic!
title: Great Family Holiday

text:
We stayed at Seriska Satu for 5 nights in the middle of November 2022 as a whānau group of 8 made up of 3 kids and 5 adults. 

Right from the booking the communication was great. Putra the manager was waiting for us on arrival and the complimentary transfer from the airport was easy. It was a very late check in and everything was explained well. All the staff were fabulous with a special mention to the chef. We ate in on our last night and he cooked us a feast of seafood and traditional Balinese dishes, it was amazing. 

The Villa is made up of an enclosed kitchen and lounge area, then off that a sundeck and a wing that is 3 of the bedrooms, one is a bunk room, then a twin single the bathroom joins these 2 with interconnecting doors. Then a double bedroom with its own bathroom and sunken bath also interconnects to other rooms.  There is also the 4th stand alone master room with its own huge bathroom. The pool is an L shape around a gazebo with a spa pool also. 

The location in north Sanur is perfect and close as to the beach through a locked gate but also quick access to the street. We hired bicycles which were a game changer to get around on and we all had many an adventure on them all organised through Putra and laundry service also. Complimentary breakfast was delicious.

We will be back again without a doubt. I also take tours to Bali from NZ and am getting this business up and running again post covid. Villa Seriska is now top of the list for our Sanur stays. Thank you Putra and staff for having us and being such wonderful people making everything so easy for a perfectly relaxing holiday. We appreciate you and your 5 star service.
title: Simply the Best

text:
Our amazing 2 room luxury villa with a gorgeous private pool was a serene oasis away from the hustle and bustle of the streets of Seminyak.
A very special thanks to Made and Yuni who turn a great visit into exceptional one. Their warmhearted welcomes, top class service and delicious breakfasts were the highlight of our trip. 
The Villa was well well equipped with great AC. We loved every minute of our weeks stay here.
The Villa is a short stroll from lots of restaurants and bars . 
Villa Seriska is the perfect place to unwind after a days touring or after a good night out.

text: I had my wedding ceremony in Bali. I initially chose Nilesh's villa because I have 10 guests and I'd like the villa to be in modern style so that the guests can live comfortably, and his villa completely satisfied my needs. This was the starting of my fantastic journey with Nilesh. For my wedding ceremony, I need to arrange a wedding dinner for all my guests. My wife and I had a lot of requirements and ideas about this wedding dinner, and Nilesh was so helpful and thoughtful along the entire process of planning and accomplishing this wedding dinner: Firstly, We had at least 20 long and organized messages back and forth to discuss the menu, style, drinks, price of the wedding dinner, and he was always able to accomodate my requests by coordinating with his team; Furthermore, since it's a wedding dinner, we wanted to decorate the villa according to a picture that my wife and I like, he helped us perform a lot of research and eventually found a great decoration provider; Lastly, my wife and I requested a "Photo Booth" van but there is not a concept of this in Bali at this point, Nilesh helped us find a beautiful VW van and decorate it to help us achieve the "Photo Booth" van concept. On the wedding dinner day, the rain is on and off, and Nilesh and his team can quickly react to the weather and help us adjust the setups/decorations. We really appreciate all his efforts of planning and making all this happen. My wife, all my guests and I all think very highly of this wedding dinner. Since this is the first time of me in Bali, I had a lot of questions regarding to food, transportation, drinks, tourist places, etc, Nilesh was so helpful and helped us resolve all our questions and concerns. He also had a good team in the villa: Thomas was our driver, our wedding ceremony required a lot of rides here and there, and he was always able to arrive and deliver on time. For some of the days, he even worked more than 12 hours, for example, we need him to help us pick up guests and send to the wedding ceremony place, and we need him to help us send my guests back to their hotel after the wedding dinner, etc. Eka helped us cook daily breakfast, lunch and dinner. If you like spicy food, please try his Indonesian Stir-Fried noodle with his secret chili sauce, it was sooo good! Putra, Alet and Nur helped us take care of other normal stuffs including managing the daily matters, pressing shirts, sending/picking up laundry for my wedding suits, cleaning the room, etc. In a word, we really really enjoyed our stay at Nilesh's villa, and without his help along the way, we for sure cannot achieve such a successful wedding ceremony.
title: Great wedding dinner experience!

title: terrible

owner_response.text:
Bali is a tropical island. If you leave half eaten food exposed in the kitchen area overnight, ants can be attracted to such food remains. We clean our villas thoroughly everyday and use environment friendly anti-insect protection; we do not use strong poisons which could affect the natural wildlife of our beautiful island. 

Your comment about location of our villa is a mystery as our villa is located in the heart of Seminyak, one of the most fashionable tourist locations in Bali. An international standard supermarket “Bali Deli” is within 3 minutes walk from our villa. You can see from other TripAdvisor reviews, all our other guests love the location of all our villas. Anyway, we are glad to hear that your experience of our service was “lovely” :)
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
We recently stayed in Villa Seriska Dua, Sanur for 5 nights. My husband, 4 yr old daughter and 18 month old son shared this beautiful villa with our good friends and their 2yr old daughter, and we could not have picked a better place to stay. We had all been to Bali before but it was our first time with kids so we were drawn to villa Seriska because of its resemblance to a family home. We wanted the kids to be able to roam freely and enjoy themselves without needing constant herding and supervision- I originally avoided looking at villas because of the pool issue- (none of our kids are confident in the water without our presence) but a pool fence was installed at our request for no extra cost which allowed us to really relax and enjoy ourselves! 
The layout was ideal for two families with two amazing master suites at opposite ends of the property (great for privacy!) and two twin single rooms for our kids close by our master suite. The central living space is bright and airy, beautifully furnished with Balinese style decor. The villa looks in real life every bit as beautiful as the pictures on their website.

The villa staff were as 5 star as the villa itself- from Thomas (the driver) and Wayan who was there every morning to open up the doors and make coffee for us, the chef who prepared a delicious breakfast every morning, to Nilesh (the host and owner) who was there to welcome us to and bid us farewell from the villa, and Putra (manager) who also welcomed us, and gave us a mobile phone with which to contact him at any time with any requests. There are also friendly staff in the security area at the front of the villa 24 hours a day- we hardly knew they were there but we felt incredibly safe knowing they were. 

Massages were organised by Putra at our request and the masseurs were there within minutes- best massages we have ever had right there by the pool for an incredible price. 

Every evening the beds are turned down, the bedrooms sprayed for mosquitoes and coils lit in all the bathrooms- I didn't get bitten once in 5 days! 

And finally the location- at the southern end of Sanur it's more of a quiet residential area, but plenty of restaurants, ATMs, 24hr supermarkets- even a bottle shop- within a 5 min walk of the villa. We walked to the beach in about 10 minutes but that's with 3 kids under 5- it would be a lot quicker otherwise. Plus there are bicycles for use if you wanted to ride it would be 5 minutes or less. We found plenty of great restaurants a couple of streets away and rarely needed to use a cab!  Also- we had the chef cook up a fantastic 3 course Indonesian meal for us at the villa one night which was sensational, and one of the lovely ladies even entertained our crabby 18 month old for half an hour so we could enjoy it in peace! 

A fabulous villa, perfect location, amazing staff- I just can't fault Villa Seriska Dua and we will be back many more times in the future!
title: Perfect relaxing break for family and friends!

text: Everything was perfect, we stayed there 10 days with our 8 and 10 yo daughters. Nilesh was waiting for us at the villa when we arrived (he sent us a driver to pick us up at the airport), we immediately felt at home,, the villa is beautiful. Everybody was nice there, helping us planning our itinerary, our meal, our confort every day. They also give us a cell phone for local call with a credit in case you need to reach them, specialy Putra, the villa manager, who took really good care of us. Thinks may help : you don't need to carry all your dressing in your suitecases, you can give a landry bag to the staff and they bring us clean the day after for about 1$/kg. You have a lot of restaurants, take away food, supermarkets all around the villa or on the beach if you need anything. We also enjoyed the pool to much. I already recommend Nilesh'villa to friens of mine who are planning to visit Bali. Thanks again for everything, we will come back :) An unforgettable stay in a beautiful island with friendly people. Tout est parfait, nous avons séjourné 10 jours avec nos filles de 8 et 10 ans. Nilesh nous attendait à la villa à notre arrivée (après avoir envoyé un chauffeur nous recuperer à l'aéroport), on s'est immédiatement senti à la maison la villa est sublime. Tout le monde est super gentil, ils nous ont assisté dans la planification de nos visites, des repas, tout ce qui pouvait rendre notre séjour confortable. Ils nous ont également remis un téléphone portable avec un crédit pour les appels locaux pour nous permettre de les joindre, spécialement, Putra, le manager de la villa, qui s'est parfaitement bien occupé de nous. Petites informations qui peuvent vous aider : vous pouvez remettre votre linge sale au personnel qui le portera au pressing pour 1$/kg de linge, pas besoin de surcharger les valises. Il y a autour de la villa, ou sur la plage, de nombreux restaurants, sur place ou à emporter ou des supermarchés avec tout le necéssaire. Et la piscine est fantastique. J'ai déjà recommandé la villa de Nilesh à des amis qui prevoient de partir prochainement à Bali. Un séjour inoubliable sur une ile magnifique avec les gens merveilleux
title: Soooooo relaxing

text:
Bali has to be one of my top favourite places to holiday. It’s not just the fact that it’s an island paradise with beautiful beaches, sunsets, tropical foods and scents, it’s the service and smiles that come with it that make it the holiday of a lifetime. Our recent family adventures took us first to Sanur and then to the magical Klungkung. I’m so happy to have explored different parts of Bali, both so very beautiful and unique in their own right. We stayed at 2 magnificent villas run by Villa Seriska, and I now understand why they have been voted Number #1 on Trip Advisor and won the Certificate of Excellence in 2013 and 2014. The villas, the details, the luxury, and above all the hospitality and services were faultless. As a couple of hard working parents in great need of some pampering and relaxation, we certainly received more than we could have expected. And all with a smile and gratitude.
We have been blessed to have experienced our fair share of luxury holidays around the world, but Bali always seems to come out on top. It’s all in the details. At Villa Seriska we had our own personal chef to cook us whatever we liked, catering to our own special needs and dietary requirements. A driver to take us anywhere we fancied, though we didn’t feel like leaving at all, as it was just too beautiful in our villa :) We had a wonderful manager to attend to any needs that arose…and travelling with children there are usually quite a few ;) It surely helps to make a holiday with your kids an actual holiday when you have so much help. Our lovely housekeepers were so wonderful with the children and even offered to help us with babysitting when we needed. My children fell in love with them and couldn’t wait to see them each day. They were so happy, and so were we. My wonderful husband, Bobby and I, had time to really connect. Beach walks, watching the sunset whilst talking about our dreams and aspirations and sweet kisses under the gazebo. It was all so very magical.
Sanur is seriously the perfect place to stay in Bali if you want a little luxury, beach, shopping and dining without it being too crowded. It is so much quieter than Kuta (in the best possible way) though there is still so much to do right at your doorstep. Upon stepping out of our villa we had restaurants, bars, boutiques, beach markets and of course the beach with a spectacular view of Lembongan Island and Mt. Agung. Our 4 bedroom villa, perfect for families and groups of friends, was decked out in all kinds of detailed design perfection. Everywhere I looked I was amazed by something beautiful. The woodwork, the towel designs, the flowers, the bathrooms….it was all so divine. The gazebo, spa and pool area were definitely the best and thoroughly utilised by us all each day and night. My children were obsessed with feeding the koi fish, cannon balling off the gazebo into the pool, and the chef’s amazing food!
We can’t thank owners Audrey and Nilesh, and the beautiful staff of Villa Seriska enough for their generous hospitality and very genuine caring. It’s so refreshing and an absolute joy to stay somewhere like this. They really set themselves apart by their high standards.
With love and gratitude, Helen
title: Perfect holiday!

text: Prefect villa in sanur! Good services, yummy breakfast... The staff are so nice. The location is prefect, near the beack (walk around 5-10mins)... Hope to visit soon
title: Prefect villa

text: Our family of 8 were all indeed overjoyed with the "home away from home" stay at Villa Seriska. The villa and facilities were superb ... excellent location and service were comparable to any 5 star accommodation. We especially enjoyed ALL the dinners specially prepared to the satisfaction of all our taste buds. We will return and recommend friends to come to Villa Seriska!!
title: Great stay at Villa Seriska Dua, Sanur

text:
This is our 4 th trip to this beautiful Island paradise Bali
This however is the best family vacation, mainly because of the perfect choice of accom!
Here in Villa Seriska Dua we have a 4 bedroom( all ensuite, with sky light showers and 2 with tubs!) + private pool, beautifully landscaped garden.
To top this it comes with a full kitchen, and if wish pure authentic Balinese cuisine, 2 chefs are available at your pleasure, with your choice of dishes + open BBQ for Ikan bakar, Babi guleng etc!
A driver is available for your customized tour, for which we did Ubud in a day!
And now for what you have been waiting...
For the 3N stay, We (8pax) each paid USD 150 for the bungalow + USD 150 for all meals tours and transfers! 
And here is the contact:
Write to Neelash or Putra!
http://www.seriska.net/mobile/

Happy holidays!

Francis
title: Bali with a difference!

text: Just returned from a fortnight staying at Villa Seriska Sanur and wanted to share our fantastic experience with other would be guests. Right from the beginning the villa's owner Nilesh was helpful and ever courteous, replying to my email queries very promptly and in good detail. On arrival the villa was every bit as stunning as the photographs depicted and the staff went over and above to make our stay as comfortable as we could have hoped for. We were 7 guests from the UK but also had Australian family staying locally who came most days to visit us so ages ranged from 2.5 years old to 50's/60 year olds. The meals cooked for us were superb with so much attention to detail, you order what you would like the day before and pay for the ingredients and hey presto beautiful meals prepared for you the following day. Putra managed the villa and he was always ready at the end of the phone to sort out diving trips, cycle hire, island outings, yoga teachers and masseurs to visit - nothing was too much trouble. Wayan, Kadek and Rian looked after us and cooked for us at the villa and they really were so lovely - the Bali people that I have come to love so much in our couple of visits. Thomas our driver was an absolute character, picking us up and dropping us off sometimes on long 12 hour trips. He made us laugh so much as he nannied us about the island and often picking us up from different places that we'd arranged because we had found a cafe or a bar that we got 'stuck' in for the afternoon! It really was the most wonderful holiday experience, I will admit that I was nervous as it is obviously a fairly expensive holiday (for us as previous backpackers) but it was undoubtedly worth every penny and we would dearly love to go back and visit our Bali family again one day in the future. I cried on the plane home and have never done that before so says it all for me. Thank you so much everyone at Villa Seriska, we miss you :)
title: Outstanding holiday destination

text:
We recently returned from a month-long stay at the villa.  Bali being the destination of choice for a 50th birthday celebration.  

When I think of the villa - the first thing that jumps to mind is the staff.  Some are there more than others, but everyone providing a service to this property was excellent!  All, just really good people who met our every need.  They can all take credit for making our stay very comfortable.

As for the villa - the interior is comfortable overall.  The bedrooms and bathrooms being the standouts.  The kitchen and living area could use a little TLC, which I did mention to staff and to the owner (Nilesh).  But the staff left it spotless for us each day.  I only rated "sleep quality" as 3 stars, because of a neighbourhood dog that barked endlessly at all times during the 24 hr clock!  (Not the owners dog (Monster) ... she's cool!)  But it had nothing to do with the beds.  They were excellent by everyone's account.

The outdoor space is peaceful and private, but again - in need of some love.  Just cosmetics really.  The lounge deck in wooden, and being exposed to the elements - all outdoor wood products need work over time.  (sand it, coat it and tack down the stray nails)   The pool is great and is cleaned regularly, and the lounge area offers rotating sun or shade throughout the day.  The garden areas surrounding the pool, entrance way and fish pond have a nice, tropical feel, but being in the industry - I couldn't help myself from wanting to change a few things.  It's well maintained as far as watering and cleaning, but could easily go from average to spectacular!  Slap a coat of paint on the privacy walls - repair some cracks in the concrete and get rid of that awful vine (some invasive morning glory'ish thing?) that is taking over everything!  All very easily done, and not an absolute necessity.  More so; things I would do as an owner.  Purely aesthetics :-)

The villa is located at the end of a very tidy lane, lined with other villas, and is just minutes to most of what you may need.  One of the main thoroughfares of Seminyak is just a couple of blocks away, and the beach - about 20 minutes on foot.  

Overall - we were happy with the stay, and would recommend the villa to other travelers.  Again - I cannot say enough good things about the staff!
title: Villa Seriska Dua, Seminyak

text: Thank you to Nilesh and his wonderful, amazing staff. Our stay at Villa Seriska was an absolute pleasure for 4 days and our only regret is that we cannot stay longer! We will be sure to recommend Villa Seriska to all our friends. We so hope to return before we move back to the USA. Thank you!
title: Heaven!

text: Just brilliant! A lovely welcoming group of people at Villa Seriska. Every need we had was met and then some … The accommodation was amazing, the food spectacular and the driving was nothing short of stupendous. I think Thomas should be granted a very special licence to get around Bali in the size of that van! Thank you for making our first overseas family holiday an unforgettable one! We will recommend you to everyone !!! Thank you, thank you, thank you !
title: Perfect Family Holiday

text: We recently stayed at Villa Seriska with a group of 9 of us, ranging in age from 19 up to 74. It was the perfect place to stay. The Villa was very spacious and given there was 9 of us, there was plenty of room for everyone. The pool was bigger than it looked in the pictures and we were most pleased to see that the villa lived up to the website (not always the case). We all found the beds so comfortable that I think we need to now replace ours at home to replicate the wonderful sleep we had there. The staff and owner, Nilesh, made our stay very easy. Nilesh was wonderful to communicate with prior to arriving and always responded within hours of my sent email. Thomas our driver  took us to some lovely restaurants and was only too happy to book a tour or suggest an activity for any interested. He never failed to come through with the goods. We were even provided with a local mobile so we could call if we had any issues while we were out (we named it the bat phone). We had young adults with us and Thomas was wonderful in giving them tips to stay safe while out clubbing in Kuta. Thomas even drove us to an orphanage and helped some of our family navigate the local supermarket for food supplies with one of the children from the orphanage. A staff member was often present during the day (doing housekeeping or tending to the gardens) but they were very unobtrusive. They had staff quarters on the property and would tend to wait for us to go out to attend to our rooms or ask if it was ok to go and clean the bathroom or make up our beds if we were around. The rooms were sprayed each afternoon to protect against bugs and mosquitos. What can I say about the location. It was great. The villa is down a short lane way off the main street of Sanur. For anyone who knows Sanur, The street cafe is literally on the corner of the lane way (very handy for a quick lunch or dinner. Try the pizza). Halfway down the lane way is a great day spa. Most of our group had a treatment there and they were very good. To head to the beach there's a locked gate that leads to the back of Sindu market. It was a very short stroll through the market and you came out at Benno's and Mango Bar restaurants on the beach. And if you're into your photography or just love the peace of a sunrise, you can't go past a saner sunrise.  It was also very reassuring to have a security guard positioned outside the villa 24 hours. One night we forgot to lock our door and were quickly reminded by security who'd done a nightly check. All in all we had a wonderful time and would highly recommend staying at Villa Seriska. We hope to come back again.
title: 21st Birthday Celebration at Villa Seriska Satu Sanur Bali.

photos.caption: The van used by the Villa

text: Thank you for making our holiday extra special. We stayed at one of the new additions to the seriska collection in Seminyak and were very lucky to be looked after by all the amazing staff at the villa - the housekeeping staff, the chefs (amazing breakfasts!) management and the owners. Everyone was helpful and friendly. The addition of a pool fence is great for familes. Our daughter Maddy became very attached to "Monster" the owners dog - she was so beautiful and friendly and cuddly! The villa is situated in an ideal location in Seminyak - close to many excellent restaurants and shops. At the end of a long day shopping, we were eager to utilise the pool at the villa! We miss Villa Seriska .. thanks again to all the staff  … Maddy loved the "towel animals" creations every night ! Amazing ! Niluh, Maddy loved having you babysit, you are so lovely :) We hope to be back again one day!
title: Awesome experience!

text:
We had a family get together to celebrate 70th birthday with over a dozen members spanning three generations with Grand parents, parents and  children and are indeed glad to have chosen Villa Seriska Sanur for our stay. Nilesh the owner by giving on arrival  a very candid and elaborate intro of Bali clarifies all concerns,doubts enabling us to we jump into celebrations, fun and frolic from the word go. Staff headed by Manager/caretaker,Cook and support staff made our stay a memorable one. Thomas the driver took us around on all the four days and his familiarity and knowledge was a great help in meeting all our requirements of sight seeing,shopping and dining etc. Masseurs too were arranged at the villa itself.
 In short a wonderful holiday made so by the Villa-its location, tastefully furnishing, clean and safe  pool and hospitality of staff -it  made us wanting to extend our stay or come again asap.
Just a suggestion for Nilesh. Small fridge in the bedroom and better lighting on the writing desk will help particularly the senior citizen types.
title: Excellent Family Get together

text:
We had been planning my Dad's 70th birthday for over 9 months and chose Bali as the destination for the same. We were 14 people including kids and stayed at Villa Seriska in Sanur. When you are organising a family vacation ( Youngest Member being 15 months old and Oldest 75 years!) , you need to keep in mind that the place has to be convenient for all age groups. This Villa was perfect for that. 

It has a private entrance to the beach, is located very close to the main shopping area at Sanur, has plenty of good restaurants and cafes nearby and has a very helpful and accommodating staff. The Villa is clean and tastefully done. If you are fine with spending a few extra bucks for the massages, you can even call someone to the Villa to give you one by the pool. The Villa's driver, Thomas is very good and knows his way around Bali. The chef prepared a delicious Mei Goreng meal for us. The manger, Putra arranged for a yummy cake for my Dad's birthday and also with our restaurant bookings. Nilesh, the owner had some great tips to share on how to plan your days and where to shop around. 

Highly recommended for a large group, looking for a home away from home!
title: Perfect Family Villa!

text: This is the second time we’re staying at Villa Seriska Bali with Nilesh, Putra & team. Both stays were wonderful – all the more so when Nilesh agreed to rent us the Villa last minute due to some problems with another Villa we booked elsewhere – it was a life-saver. The Villa’s cosy for 7 adults & 3 kids with its 3 bedrooms. Very well kept, clean and comfortable. Location’s unbeatable as its tucked into a small lane along Jalan Kunti so quiet and peacefully secluded, but still within 5-10 mins walking distance to the restaurants & shops along Jalan Kunti & Jalan Drupadi itself. Extremely convenient. As usual, Nilesh & team were very hospitable and welcoming, and we have a great time. And my kids can’t forget the warm welcome from “Monster” the dog as well! Highly recommended and will stay at Villa Seriska Bali again in future.
title: Fantastic 2nd Stay at Villa Seriska Bali, Seminyak

text:
You feel welcome becaause of the cortesous staff. Good for family vacation upto 14 people. We celebrated Birthday with family and felt as we were at home. Thank you Nilesh for personnel breifing and tips. Your suggestions wewre excellant. Need attension for wifi, it was not working properly when we were there.
Excellant, helpul and courteouse stagf.
title: Family Holiday Good Place

text:
Once again we returned to Villa Seriska, this time Seminyak Dua for a family holiday.

The villa is very comfortable, very clean, tastefully furnished and has a lovely garden setting and good sized pool. It is also very well located in Seminyak, close to many shops, cafes all well within walking distance. The breakfasts we had prepared were very tasty, freshly prepared by Villa Seriska's in house chef and greatly appreciated by all our family. Our children loved the pancakes in particular. 

We would definitely return again.  Nilesh the owner, is a very helpful and accommodating host and his staff in particular, Niluh, Made and Mura were wonderful. We had a very relaxing stay, just what we needed after a hectic few weeks. Thankyou again to all staff at Villa Seriska and hope to see you again soon.
title: Wonderful family holiday

text: Thank you everyone for making us feel very welcomed and settled in at Villa Seriska Dua, Sanur. The villa is beautiful, very well set out for both our families and the pool fence was a relaxing touch as we had two small children in our group. Very friendly people, food was excellent and we all really enjoyed our stay. Our kids loved the stay at the villa so in turn so did we the grown up's! Thanks again and see you soon again:)
title: didn't want to leave

text:
4 generations worth of family travelling together is never easy. But Villa Seriska's staff made it seamless and effortless! Thank you Nilesh (owner) for recommending the Villa that suited our family dynamic. To Putra, excellent service extended to all of us and meeting with our needs. Thanks to Thomas (or Tho Must), our driver for all 4 days. To Chef who cooked sumptuous breakfast everyday and as well to the housekeeping team. We felt instantaneously at home the minute we stepped through the Villa's gate.=D

Villa Seriska Sanur Dua is a brand new addition to three existing villas (we saw the one in Seminyak as well). It has a modern, single leveled, spacious open concept layout, with 4 well sized bedrooms + en-suites each (which we loved!), a relaxing pool area + dinning table (if you choose to have our meals outdoors). Equipped with a modern kitchen, dinning area, TV/living area, wi-fi/computer, a mini first aid kit and a Villa mobile phone to contact the staff needed during your stay. 
It is not located at the beach front, but mere 5-7 min bicycle ride away (provided by the Villa).=)

Unfortunately, we have not been able to fully enjoy the tranquility and services (such as spa, lunch or dinner) available at the Villa during our short stay. Therefore we will make it a point to re-visit ANY of the Villas Seriska in the near future! 
Once again, a BIG THANK YOU to the Team for the 5* personalized hospitality/service extended to our family; making this trip a memorable one!
title: Couldn't ask for more @ Villa Seriska Sanur Dua!

text: Villa Seriska is truly excellent. We had a wonderful holiday. Nilesh and his team are fantastic and really look after you in all respects. This villa already has wonderful reviews and I fully endorse all the wonderful comments made. Villa is beautiful with gorgeous garden. It is very close to all the activity in Sanur but tucked away down a small side lane off the main street so very quiet and private. Walking distance to all restaurants, shops, beach front etc. Sanur itself is really great with a wonderful atmosphere. There are loads of excellent restaurants and very cheap. Our favourites were Warung Little Bird (very close to Villa), Pregina, 3 Monkeys, Cinnamon, Mades (evenings only), Rib, Tootsies and Beach Café (last 2 on the beachfront). Street restaurants were slightly better than beach ones but all are very good. Spa/salon nearest to Villa is excellent too.
title: Fantastic Excellent Villa Seriska

text:
Thank you so much for your kind hospitality! We had a great time in Bali! We almost felt like at home. Special thanks to Putra for organising everything for us and to Niluh and the 2 Mades for their excellent services. We also appreciated that Nilesh (the owner) was there on our first and last day to welcome us and to say goodbye and inbetween to have a look if everything was ok, very nice gesture. You are all so friendly and smiling every day!
We were also very lucky, that there was a pool fence and stair fence, so our children (3&1) were safe all the time :-)
@Niluh: Wayan and especially little Made will certainly miss you. Wayan already asked when we will see Niluh again.
We are sad that we had to leave after almost three weeks. Hope to see you again some day!
title: Lovely time at Villa Seriska Satu in Seminyak

text:
We were a group of two Australian families with children aged under 5. 

We stayed for one week in Seriska and one week in their new sister villa called Seriska Dua. I will talk a bit about villa seriska first. 

Villa Seriska was perfect. It had attentive staff, beautiful rooms and the location was a pleasant 5 minute stroll through a private pathway down through a local market then to the beach. The area of the beach it is located at is good because it is in the main area and not near the big hotels' private beach areas. 

The facilities are made as if the owner had built it to live in it himself. The area is staffed by security and you cannot hear much from surrounding villas or traffic. The staff are superb. They went out of their way to help us when the kids got sick. The manager Putra was fantastic and very obliging and was always contactable by the villa's mobile phone. 

We brought mosquito nets with us but found they were unnecessary as the staff do a turn down service and put out  mosquito coils for the outdoor bathroom areas and close the sleeping areas. There is a local small supermarket 2 minutes walk away. There is a larger supermarket called Hardys that is a taxi ride for under $5. By the way if you want souvenirs you can get a lot of them at Hardys. 

Beach- good beach for little kids because of the off shore reef unlike seminyak which has big waves. The beaches aren't the fine white sand and pristine blue waters you get elsewhere (in fact Australia's beaches are much better) however the water was warm. 

Villa Seriska DUA

We stayed our second week in the newer villa seriska. Location was not that good. It takes a good 10-15 minutes to walk to the beach and then that's to the area of beach where all the big hotels are. Therefore you have to walk another 10 minutes further as the hotels will not allow you to use their beach chairs etc even if you offer to buy food and drinks from their 
restaurants. Bikes are provided by the villa but if you have little kids then it is not suitable. There is one child seat however. We lamented that perhaps a hotel on the beach would have been nice as you can just walk straight out on to the beach or pool which are 30m from each other. However there is the advantage of having a villa to yourself. 

The villa itself is good but not as good as the original seriska. It has been made as a rental. The bedroom with a pool view is very nice but the garden view room is not as nice so if you're going halves with another family you will have to rock paper scissors. Also the garden view bathroom had a constant sewerage smell from bad drainage (shower took a long time to drain). The staff are excellent and I highly recommend having the chef cook dinner for you in the villa. 

Baby sitting is available through a local lady who was excellent with our 6 month old and comes highly recommended. 

Day trips are possible to almost anywhere in Bali. You can hire a driver at seriska for about US$40-50 called Thomas. He's a nice guy but he will take you to the usual tourist haunts where the big tourist buses go eg supposed fine art galleries that seemed quite massed produced in our opinion. However if you do your 
research before you can go where you like. We found a great local artist in Sanur that has authentic non-commercial art. 

All in all the seriska staff are excellent and the seriska number one comes highly recommended.
title: Villa seriska Sanur

text: We stayed at the villa for a week with two families (two three year olds and a six month old baby). It was great. Comfortable rooms with semi-out door bathrooms, gorgeous pool and gardens, nice communal living areas. The location is great -- short stroll from the beach and the main street in Sanur. The staff are lovely. One night our little boy was sick and the chef, Ketut, went out twice on his motorbike to buy medicine for us. Very kind. I recommend having dinner at the villa. The surrounding restaurants are fine but nothing spectacular. One of our best meals in Bali was made by Ketut. He bought fresh seafood from the markets in Jimbaran and made a traditional Balinese dish for us. Friends stayed a second week in Villa Seriska Dua, which is also nice but Villa Seriska has nicer pool and gardens and better location (although Seriska Dua provides bikes to help around). There is no pool fence possible at Villa Seriska but we kept our eyes on the kids, assisted by the nanny recommended by the villa, Ni-Luh. Ask for her, she's great!
title: Lovely villa, gorgeous pool & gardens, friendly staff

text: We spent an amazing two weeks at Villa Seriska Dua. From day one we were looked after very well by the wonderful staff. We felt throughout our stay that in fact the quality of the staff is a major strength of the villa. They love their job and always go the extra mile with a bright smile. Nilesh has been a great communicator, answering all our questions promptly. Putra is a fantastic organiser as he needs to manage four villas, not just this one. Kadek is an amazing housekeeper and we loved Rian's happy bubbly nature. They were both amazing at helping us relax, taking care of things without being intrusive. Tomas! We were so happy to have booked him for the whole length of our stay. He was so very flexibility which is good with an extended family of 10. Thank you, Tomas! The villa is beautiful. New and most importantly sunny. The pool was just the right temperature to cool us down, but not too cold. I will never get over the bathroom. I want one at home…..somehow I don't think it's possible. We will simply have to come back again to experience the wonderful hospitality! Will miss you all!
title: simply amazing

text: A very big thank you to all the staff at Villa Seriska for making our stay and first time in Bali an incredible experience !! Thank you Nilesh for a beautiful villa that catered to all our needs and more! The accommodation and ambience was perfect and things like wifi and a variety of channels makes you feel right at home! Thank you to Manik, Niluh and both Made's for being so hospitable and tending to all our needs! Your bright smiles and yummy breakfast every morning made our days even better. Our biggest thank you to Putra, you were simply amazing! Your patience is superhuman and everyday you were incredibly helpful and your knowledge of Bali made travelling a walk in the park! We will miss you all immensely and wish we could take you back with us! A special mention for Monster! She is the sweetest, most adorable dog, she helped us miss our own little puppy a little less! We can't wait to come back to Bali, you have made our first experience so wonderful! Up until then, terimakasi! and keep smiling!
title: Villa Sariska, Seminyak

text:
Seriska Villa in Sanur has everything you could ask for and more!  The Villa is fabulous, the staff are wonderful, and the location is perfect!
We were picked up from the airport, then met at the Villa by Nilesh the owner, who introduced us to the staff and told us what to expect and gave us some great tips. 
Nothing was too much trouble for the staff. Putra, the Villa's manager did everything possible to make our stay perfect, from sorting out my lost suitcase to recommending and booking activities and great places to eat.
The breakfast each morning was fantastic, cooked by the chef Ketut, and the proximity to the beach and the markets was a bonus.
Everything about this place was amazing with absolutely nothing to fault!
I'd recommend it to anyone, including groups of friends but particularly to families...perfect for 2 families holidaying together.
title: Best stay ever in Bali!

text: Thank you for looking after us and making our stay so memorable. We really enjoyed the villa, the pool and the friendly staff. Thank you Putra for organising our tours, booking restaurants and massages. We will never forget your friendly smile :) We look forward to our next stay at Villa Seriska!
title: Villa Seriska, Amazing!

text: We had a lovely stay at Villa Seriska. As a family of 5 with 3 very young children, we appreciated greatly the cooked breakfast and the lovely way the staff interacted with our children. The design of the villa, the furniture, etc. is really well done. The pool is gorgeous. Couldn't fault this villa at all and your Trip Advisor certificate of excellence is well deserved. Hope to return again very soon.
title: Lovely, relaxing stay in Sanur

text: The beautiful villa and especially the dedication of the villa management and staff made exploring Bali as a multigenerational family fun and easy. Owner Nilesh is dedicated to providing world class hospitality, villa manager Putra is 100% personally committed and professionally qualified to cheerfully customize the experience to each family's needs and quirks, chefs Wayan and Katut prepared fantastic meals and a welcoming environment when we returned from our day trips each evening, and the housekeeping and security staff made sure we were taken care of 24/7. The pool was the center for gathering and relaxing, while four bedrooms (each with a huge fantasy bathroom) provided privacy. Highly recommended for families and other groups.
title: Highly Recommended

photos.caption: Island of calm in an interesting neighborhood

text:
Villa Seriska Sanur is really amazing. Everything is perfect. The villa is so beautiful and luxury and the staff so friendly and gives a great service. It was like a dream... We were with 6 adults and three little children and it was so nice to be in a villa like this. The swimmingpool, bathrooms, bedrooms, livingroom, everything was great.  I’ve never been in a hotel or apartment so luxury as this villa. Also the location was perfect in the centre of Sanur. The owner, Nilesh is also a very nice and reliable person. When we send him an email, he always replied to us the same day.     
 When we are going back to Bali we will definitely book Villa Seriska again. Thanks again Nilesh and all the other persons of Villa Seriska for an unforgettable vacation. Please don’t hesitate to book this villa, I promise you that you will love it, just as we do.
title: Villa Seriska Sanur, really amazing!!!

text: The management and staff were wonderful. The villa was perfect as we were a family group from Grandparents, parents, teenagers AND a baby. The location met the requirements of ALL of the group. One member of the family is a Celiac, NO problems the menu can be adapted to all needs and the food was delicious. We found everyone professional, kind, helpful and VERY knowledgeable.The location is close to everything, however there is no intrusion of noise into the tranquility of the villas which are beautifully presented and furnished. We are extensive travelers and it is the ONLY destination we have stayed in where a safety fence was erected around the pool simply for the safety of our youngest grandchild. That is service!!! Needless to say we will be returning to stay.
title: Perfect

text:
I stayed at Villa Seriska Satu Seminyak with some friends for a couple of days, and we were awed with such superb customer service offered by Nilesh and his team. We were greeted by Nilesh when we arrived, who was kind enough to brief us about Bali, closest grocery shops, spas and shopping around the area. 

The team are very kind and friendly people. They accommodated to our requests and made sure that we were well taken care off. We rented their van for 2 days and went around Bali, covering the main attraction spots that we wanted to cover.

The villa is decently priced, and is within walking distance to Chill Spa and Prana Spa which is also a must go when in Bali. Bali Deli is the nearest supermarket, a bit pricey but the food's fresh. If you don't mind walking, head further along Seminyak st and there is a local supermarket called Bintang.

Warung Made, the famous Indonesian cafe at Seminyak is just 10 mins walk away from the villa, which was extremely convenient for us. There is also Warung Pak Malen, famous for babi guling which is approx 20 mins walk from the villa.

If the weather's good, enjoy the walk as there are plenty of shops around.

I truly enjoyed the stay at Villa Seriska and will definitely stay at the villa again!
title: Excellent Customer Service at Villa Seriska Seminyak

text:
We are a family of 2 adults and 3 children aged 4, 10 and 12 years. We stayed at this gorgeous villa in April for 4 nights. Well, what an absolute delight it was! Nilesh and his team were just incredible. All so very friendly, honest and helpful. 

The rooms were gorgeous and we really enjoyed the bathroom in the master bedroom. The decor was beautiful- and loved having all the lighting options. The air conditioner worked a treat and having ceiling fans was great for circulating air.

We spent lots of time in the well designed, large swimming pool. The fish pond was wonderful also and a favourite with the children.

The location of the villa is great. An easy walk to the beach/ markets and 20 metres to the main street with a huge selection of great restaurants/ warungs.

Thank you to the staff for taking great care of us and adoring our children! It really was a fantastic family holiday, one where treasured memories were made.
title: Amazing

text:
What a fantastic villa!!! Great staff, so well coming and friendly!!! Has been a fantastic week! The area is so quite, two minutes walk from the Beach and from the shops! The food at the villa is délicious and at a very good price. 
A Big Thank you to Nilesh, Putra , Agung, Ketouk and Thomast!
title: Que du bonheur!!!!

text: This was our second visit to Villa Seriska in Seminyak.   On arrival it felt like we were being welcomed by old friends.   The villa staff were all the same as our previous visit 6 months ago which is a testament to how much they love their jobs and their employer.  We got to meet Nilesh, the owner, this time around which was lovely.  I correspond with him for bookings and pre-vacation requests and he is always so helpful and accommodating, so it was nice to finally meet him.   As per usual all our requests were in order, pool fence was put up and our shopping requests were waiting for us in the fridge.   We were able to relax and start enjoying our vacation from the minute we set foot in the villa.   Putra, the villa Manager was as helpful as ever.   We set about choosing our favorite restaurants from last visit and a few new ones we wanted to try.  After an hour or so Putra had secured bookings for us.   I would recommend you book restaurants in advance as the popular ones do book out and you don't want to be disappointed.    We spent most of our time relaxing in the villa by day and enjoying the great food and bars by night.  We celebrated my sons birthday and the Team made it extra special providing cupcakes and helping us decorate to make it feel like a real birthday party.  He was so happy :)    We did decide to take a trip over to Sanur to visit the beach and have lunch.   We also decided to have a quick look at the Villa Seriska in Sanur.  It is absolute superb and will definitely try it on our next visit.   We can't wait to try something different but enjoy all the great service that Villa Seriska provides. .  Thanks Nilesh and team for another fantastic Bali Experience.
title: Our 2nd Visit didn't disappoint

text:
We absolutely loved staying at the Villa Seriska Dua in Sanur. The staff was extremely welcoming and friendly, they helped with everything they could including taking care of our two small children, the chef cooked very delicious food for us and by request they took care of our laundry (at a very good price I found out later). Absolutely fantastic. 
The Villa is very clean and I loved the interior. Modern Balinese I would say. The bathrooms are semi openair which gives a fantastic feeling of being outside. The pool area and the garden are well maintained and clean. I would recommend Villa Seriska to everyone who is looking for some luxury.
The street that the Villa Seriska Dua in Sanur is located at is not very interesting, but it's only a short walk (10-15 min.) to the beach or the center of Sanur and there are bicycles you can borrow for free, so it's very easy to get around.
title: Absolutely fantastic

text: Terima Kasih, Nilesh and all your wonderful staff of Villa Seriska! What a special place to be reunited with our parents and friends. We stayed at the Sanur villa for one week with six adults and two children (3 and 5 yrs). Fabulous pool and pond which helps the kids entertained 24/7. Lovely breakfast served each morning after an early morning swim. Day trips to Ubud, Lembogang and, of course, Uluwatu. Agung and Ana were so kind to the children and for us making coffee after coffee :) Thank you agin for a warm welcome and a memorable stay at Villa Seriska!
title: Great family stay

text: We stayed at the Villa Suta in Seminyak.What a beautiful place with warm staff. Absolutely loved it and was so well set up for families with small children. Highly recommend this villa. Lovely substantial breakfast, staff couldnt do enough for you. Was so sad to leave and we will miss everyone. Location close to restaurants and spas and not too far from all the usual attractions. Few hundred metres to Bali Deli to stock up or 5-10 minutes walk to Bali Bintang shop. Pool fence was awesome as we didnt have to worry about our 2 year old. Cant wait to go back, wish we could have brought the staff home with us! Kelly, Kevin and family, Perth.
title: Seriska Seminyak

text:
This trip to Bali we decided to stay in a villa, booking were made with Nilesh, the owner, for his new villa situated in Sanur, at that stage the website had not been updated, but looking at the quality of the other villas and TripAdvisor comments, we dove straight in  and we were not disappointed with our choice.
8 of us stayed 10 days as part of a 50th birthday celebration, a stunning birthday cake and a photographic souvenir of our birthday party were presented. 
The villa had a number of bicycles available to guest to get around Sanur which is for the best part as bicycle friendly as you can get in Bali.
All of the staff are great, and went out of their way to ensure that our stay was as relaxing and pleasant as possible, often anticipating our needs. 
Ketut is an excellent chef, and only to happy to let you watch and learn
Kedak and Dewi both have a wonderful attitude and happy nature.
Tomas is amazing and I would suggest possibly the safest driver in Bali, when 6 of the 8 came down with Bali Belly, Thomas organised a Doctor for a house visit, for the sickest he took us Hospital, Kedak and Dewi were both invaluable.
Putra, the Manager, has spent some times overseas studying Tourism and his English is excellent, his knowledge and enthusiasm for his work is contagious, with nothing being a problem. 

Nilesh the owner is always welcoming, takes any suggestions on board and is very friendly and accommodating, the staff seem well treated by Nilesh.
The villa is suitable to adult groups as well as family groups.
The day that we left we had late flights, Nilesh accommodated us by letting us staying later at no extra cost.
I would not hesitate in suggesting that if you have the opportunity to stay at Villa Seriska, don’t hesitate, the villa is one of the most relaxing places that I have stayed in Bali and the staff are excellent and friendly, we will be making bookings.

Thank you very much Nilesh and your amazing staff for a relaxing holiday and great birthday suprise.
Stayed February 2013, travelled with friends
title: Villa Seriska Bali

text: Thanks to the wonderful service of the team, Mr Putra and his colleagues. My family had a very good time during our stay in the villa. We love the pool, it is very clean. We enjoy being served with delicious breakfast in the early morning. The staff are all very friendly and helpful! Thank you so much for giving my family a wonderful holiday!
title: Thanks for giving my family a very wonderful holiday

text: Lovely villa, we all had lots of fun! We have been to Bali 14 plus times and this was the best stay so far !!! Thank you Nilesh and all the lovely staff. Ready to book our next trip!!  Rooms and garden look better in real life than photo's.  Great location close to beach and shops.
title: Villa Seriska - Loved It

text: Thank you so much to everybody at Villa Seriska for an amazing holiday. What can I say …. It was perfect!! We could not have asked for anything more. The staff, service, food and the compassion & generosity were all far beyond our expectation. Travelling with Mitchell (our 11year old autistc son) is not always easy, but you made it so enjoyable! The staff were so incredible with him and that means the world to us. We can't wait to come back and we have already booked for next Easter :) Thanks also for making Paul's birthday in Bali so special.
title: Perfect family holiday

text:
Having had a stressful year, I was looking forward to my holiday in Bali.  And I was not disappointed!

On arrival, the staff were warm and welcoming.  They were unobtrusive but were happy to organize any request that I had, including getting my laundry done the next day! Nothing was too much trouble and service was always with a smile.
Nilesh the owner, who lives in Bali goes the extra mile and was able to talk about what Bali has to offer in terms of restaurants and places of interest, etc.  On recommendation, I had the opportunity of going for a drink and watching a beautiful sunset at Hotel Ayana. 

The Villa was surrounded by overhanging plants which gave the Villa a sense of privacy, an oasis of peace and calm. It was clean, spacious, air conditioned and the ladies cleaned it daily.  A well presented villa as described in the website.
Also loved the idea of having a shower with an open roof, it made me feel at one with nature and was quite the contrast from my white tiled bathroom in England.

The locations was great as the shops, cafes and local restaurants are 5 minutes walk from the Villa in Seminyak. The beach is close by with white sandy beaches that provide activities for adults as well as children.

Breakfast was served and you can request for a light breakfast (choices of fruit and toast) or the full works ie bacon, eggs and toast. I had the chef cook an evening meal and was delighted with the food and it was presented in a typical Balinese style, with a smile.

Will recommend this for singles like me needing to recharge your batteries, families, couples and honeymoon couples!!

My stay was most enjoyable and I would urge anyone considering staying in Bali and wanting to experience the full Balinese culture, while enjoying the hospitality of the staff in the Villa, this is the place for you.
title: Highly Recommended!

text: Thank you so much for making our stay here so lovely. The villa, surroundings and service are beyond what we expected. We have fallen in love with Bali and hope to return one day soon. A huge thanks to Thomas and Putra for taking such good care of us.
title: Fantastic time

text: To everybody at Villa Seriska: We felt to be in a part of heaven, where everybody could imagine to be someone else … where all our dreams came true! Thank you again for the kindness of all the staff and the beautiful place that is Villa Seriska!
title: GREAT PLACE !!!

text:
Just left Seriska and could not agree more with previous reviews.  For our family of 5, the villa was a perfect set-up.  All of the staff of the villa made this trip very special- attentive, kind, and really wonderful.  The highlight for us was Ketut, the chef at the villa.  The food in Sanur is a strange hodge-podge:  Indonesian for foreigners sharing menu space with pizza, burgers at many of the restaurants in town...much of it with a few exceptions in the "just fine" category.  Ketut charmed us with his smile and his amazing food--creative, fresh, and adjusting for our son's peanut allergies as well as answering the barrage of questions from my inquisitive and enthusiastic 10 y.o daughter.

Thank you Nilesh and everyone at Seriska for a wonderful trip.  We take a piece of Bali home with us in our hearts because of you and your staff.

Other highlights:  Tirta Gangga--the water temple.  Beautiful, idyllic.  Eat lunch at the restaurant (Tirta Ayu?) just adjoining the temple grounds for a lovely view.
Bamboo Shoots Cooking School in south Sanur.  Reasonably priced, patient, kind staff, great recipes (and yummy food).  It IS, for us, all about the food
Exploring black sand beaches in search of sandy beach break for fun waves!
Bali Marine Sports for small group diving..perfect for our novice and young (12 year old) divers.

Lowpoint:  Blue Lagoon.  Dirty, crowded, small beach with really no place to sit unless you get (pay) for one of the few loungers.
title: What Others Have Said Plus...

text:
This is our third stay at villa Seriska in sanur, and we have already booked in again for next year. We feel that Seriska is our Bali home, and the Seriska staff our Bali family.this was a short stay only six nights and we found it too short. Next time we are coming for ten days. Previously we have stayed for two and three weeks. Why do we come back? We are a group of five busy women, and really relax at Seriska.  We know our way round the villa, we know the sellers at the market, we know the restaurants, and We know what to expect at Seriskabut we  also get some nice surprises. This year there was  a new outside eating area, a great improvement, a stunning birthday cake and even a photographic souvenir of our birthday party. 
All of the staff appear to like their work, and go out of their way to ensure that our stay is as relaxing as possible, often anticipating our needs. 
Ketut is an excellent chef, and also will help you with things you may require, like a push bike,or wrapping shopping.
Agung always has a serene smile and makes you feel so comfortable.
Kedak had her last day with us before her maternity leave, she has the best smile and happy nature. This also impresses us that the staff from Seriska are treated well by Nilesh the owner of the villa.
Tomas is unflappable and the safest driver in Bali, he will assist you whenever he can. He has a good sense of humor also, important to us Aussies.
Putra is also cheerful, helpfully and an all round good fellow who takes his job very seriously. When we complained about the pillow being too high he drove around Bali until he found a flat pillow.
Nilesh the owner is always welcoming, takes any suggestions we make on board and so very friendly and accommodating.
We have also stayed with our family at Seriska, we have found it suitable for adults and children and youn g adults --which surprised us a bit. We thought the kids would be out at the clubs at Kota and semi yak. But they chose to stay at the villa.
When we had late flights, nilesh has accommodated this, this year making one of the villas at Seminyaknavailable available to us to use untill we flew out and did not charge for this.   Thanks Nilesh and staff for a relaxing and trouble free holiday .
title: Third stay in three years, and booked for next year

text:
Our two families stayed here 5th to 13th July.  It was faultless.  It makes me smile just thinking about it.  Great property, fantastic pool, awesome staff and the perfect location - 1 min walk to shops/restaurants on J L Tamblingan and a 2 min walk to the beach where you are spoiled for choice of places to eat.  Thankyou Nilesh, Putra, Thomas, Ketut, Ugung and Anna for making our holiday so memorable.  We haven't stopped raving about Villa Seriska to our friends since our return home, and are already talking about coming back for a 50th birthday celebration in three years time.  

From Andrew, Kim, Sandra and children.
title: After staying here, you would never stay in a hotel again!

text:
I stayed in Villa Seriska, Seminyak with four friends in June 2012. We had an amazing time from the moment we stepped through the door of the villa. The villa was just stunning, rooms spacious, stylish comfortable, fantastic kitchen and living area with huge tv, sound system and PC, the bathrooms were amazing the pool area was fantastic I could go on but I think you get what Im trying to say here! The villa is a 15-20min walk from the beach and 1min walk to the shops and restaurants. 
The thing which makes Villa Seriska, Seminyak a must stay is the owner and staff. They are amazing and couldn't have been more friendly courteous and helpful. Nothing was too much trouble for them and they were always so friendly and chatty. Another key feature about this place and who I feel deserves a special mention is Monster the owners dog! he patters about outside the villa and is just such a lovely friendly dog and gives the place a homely feel about it!

overall a massive thank you and 10 out of 10 for Villa Seriska, Seminyak from the Irish Girls
title: An unbelievable few days! just amazing!

text:
Our two families stayed for one week at Villa Seriska and we all had a wonderful time! Great food, massages and relaxed by the pool!

All the staff were all brilliant …. make sure you try the Chef’s fantastic food … till next time …
title: Simply gorgeous!

text:
Highly recommend this Villa for families or if you have kids.Safe, convenient and best thing is you can do your own cooking.
I took a lot of time to find accomodation for my 1st trip to Bali,and was recommended to Seriska by a friend, rates are definitely cheaper than staying in a hotel or in my opinion any other place in Bali,if you are travelling more than 2 people.Nice pool,jacuzzi,and all other amenities you would need to have a comfortable stay with security.Just outside the villa,you can walk around ,there are restaurants,some shopping.A close, walk to Mcdonalds,Hardy Supermarket has everything you would need to cook.Thomas, was great, as we had only a few days in Sanur, he took us to specific spots to do our shopping, Batuan for paintings, and ubud to do handicraft shopping. My trip to bali was well worth it but what made it special was an extra friend who came to visit us when we reached the villa, it was Monster, Nilesh's dog.
My most deepest thanks goes out to Nilesh, and his team ,Putra, and the nice ladies, oh yes Chef's ( try the pancakes ) and thomas.
So all of you ,just stay here and dont look anywhere else. : )
title: Dont look elsewhere,stay here!

text:
Villa Seriska, Sanur is the right choice for our family of 9 with ages ranging from 5 to about 70.
Nilesh and his team were professional and at the same time warm and hospitable.  Feedback by previous reviewers on the services and the team were not overrated.  Kudos to Nilesh and all the staff!

The four bedrooms fitted our family perfectly with very comfortable beds and pillows. Our family had a good time getting together.  The space and facilities of the villa made it possible for the group to do different things at the same time and yet stayed close together, such as the kids splashing in the pool and guys sun-tanning on the deck while the ladies had massages in the bale. A truly enjoyable experience...   

Security was not a concern to us as a lockable safe was provided in the master room.  Beside, the service staff were on stand-by in the villa from 7am till the evening, ensuring that someone was around in the villa while we were away on day tours with Thomas, the villa's driver, who was so patient and accommodating.

In terms of location, Villa Seriska is strategically located at the back of Sindhu beach market which can be accessed through a private gate.  The beachfront cafes and restaurants e.g. Benno's, were also within easy accessibility through the market.  The villa is about 5-7 minutes' brisk walk to McDonald's, about 15 minutes' walk to Hardy's and is near several nice warungs and restaurants along Jln Danau Tamblingan.  We were never short of dining choices.

Indeed, our family had a wonderful time at Villa Seriska.  The freshly cooked hot breakfast every morning was something we looked forward to and gave us a perfect start to each day of our holiday in Bali. We wished we had stayed longer and hope we can be back!
title: An enjoyable stay in Villa Seriska, Sanur

owner_response.text:
Thank you for taking the time to write in detail about our villa and the services that we offer. We are glad that you found us both professional and warm in our hospitality. 

Our aim is to provide a comfortable fully serviced “home” from which our guests can enjoy the beauty of Bali. 

We are looking forward to welcoming you and your family to our new 4-bedroom villa in Sanur next year. 

The Villa Seriska Team
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

photos.caption: View of pool and bale from guest room

text:
Thank you so much for the great hospitality ! We had an amazing holiday; especially the ambience of the villa and the atmosphere was so good !
What we loved the most was the amazing Villa Seriska team. Everybody was so polite and friendly; we really enjoyed having them around the villa. Also, we always looked forward to having breakfast every single day … Ketut is an awesome chef ! His pancakes are to die for !! Thomas was great … so patient with us even though we had a lot of requests and demands during our tours. He always treated us so nicely :)

Thank you all again for the extra ordinary treatment you all gave us … now we feel like staying forever … we did not want to leave !! We will miss you all …
title: Marvelous! Awesome!

owner_response.text:
We are so happy to hear that you had an amazing, marvelous, awesome holiday at Villa Seriska! Thank you for your kind words about our service and hospitality … we are looking forward to welcoming you and your family to our new 4-bedroom villa in Sanur this September!

The Villa Seriska Team
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
We had a wonderful stay at Villa Seriska. Everyone was so kind, friendly and helpful!

We want to also share a few of our favour things: Bali cooking class with Dean Fisher; Soothe massage - we went there everyday! Mandala Wisata Wenara Wana is a must!

Thank you again for EVERYTHING!

The Lloyds, England, UK.
title: Wonderful stay at Villa Seriska, Seminyak

owner_response.text:
Thank you for your wonderful comments about our villa and staff. You certainly took advantage of all the fun activities available within walking distance of our villa.

We hope to welcome you and your family back to our villa the year after next!

The Villa Seriska Team
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
We spent a wonderful holiday at Villa Seriska. The staff are so nice and helpful! Thomas drove us for day trips: shopping at silver factories, art galleries, coffee plantation, rice fields in Ubud. We also enjoyed going to Kuta and the kids had a great day at the water-boom park!

Thank you all again for a wonderful holiday!
title: No problems - quite and nice place

owner_response.text:
It is an honor to receive an “excellent” rating from a “Top contributor” of TripAdvisor! We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our tour services and the hospitality of our staff. 
  
We look forward to welcoming you and your family/friends back to Villa Seriska very soon!

The Villa Seriska Team
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Our holiday to Bali far exceeded our expectations: a beautiful island and friendly people. We couldn’t have chosen better accommodation than Villa Seriska, Seminyak. All the staff were prepared to go the extra mile, far beyond their call of duty. Tania and Kristofor loved the choice at breakfast every morning. Great to see the wildlife, couldn’t believe seeing a squirrel here!! Monster (the owner’s dog) helped us feel at home, just like having Bramble, our Golden Retriever, with us. We will all miss her and treasure our time spent with her. Thanks to all for making our holiday a memorable one!
title: Lovely trip to Bali

owner_response.text:
We are happy to hear that both Bali and Villa Seriska were even better than you expected. We would like to thank you for being such friendly guests, even taking Monster for walks!

We are look forwarding forward to your next holiday with us later this year!
 
The Villa Seriska Team
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
A HUGE thank you to Nilesh, Putra, Thomas and all Villa Seriska staff for a fabulous first time trip to Bali! Everyone went above and beyond to ensure we had a great stay. Everyone was so friendly and it was great to constantly see smiling people! 
The villa is outstanding. Thank you Nilesh, Putra: you were always there for us whenever we needed anything! Thomas, thank you for the wonderful day trips. You were so patient :)
To the chef and the ladies: thank you for the terrific breakfasts every morning! It was wonderful each and everyday! You took very good care of us :)
We will never forgot our entire experience and everyone at the villa has had a part in that … Thank you all so much and we will be sure to tell our friends about the fabulous Villa Seriska!

The Whitmores - Canada
title: Our first trip to Bali

owner_response.text:
Our team also sends you a HUGH thank you for your nice comments about our villa and service. Words like ‘fabulous’, ‘outstanding’. ‘wonderful’ and ‘terrific’ are motivating for our entire team! 

It was our pleasure to welcome you and your family to our island on your first trip all the way from Canada. We hope that you can come back very soon! Thank you also for telling all your friends about your fabulous holiday at Villa Seriska.

The Villa Seriska Team
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Thank you Putra and the wonderful staff for making our holiday one to remember. Nothing was too much for any of the staff. We were spoilt with your cooking, clearing up after us and driving us anywhere we needed/wanted to go. I wish I could take each one of you back home with us (including Monster, Nilesh’s dog). Nilesh was a wonderful host.
The villa was very comfortable with four adults and two teenagers. We loved Seminyak and we will be back!
title: Awesome Villa Seriska in Seminyak

owner_response.text:
Your wonderful comments about our service are particularly appreciated as we are fully committed to providing the best service to all our guests so they have a relaxed and enjoyable holiday in Bali. Sorry you can’t take any of us back home ☺

We look forward to welcoming you and your family back to Villa Seriska soon!

The Villa Seriska Team
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: My sisters and I celebrated my birthday at the Villa.  I was surprised by Nilesh and the staff on the day with a lovely birthday cake.  Nilesh and the staff are absolutely wonderful.  My sincere thanks to Putra (the Villa Manager) who shared with us some of the Indonesian culture and his friendship.  He made our trip very special.  Also the other staff Niluh, Made, Ketut and Kadek are friendly and made our trip memorable.  Made the chef makes the best nasi goreng ever.  All the food is prepared fresh and on site.  The villa is beautiful and I love the downstairs bedroom. There is plenty of open space and places to just relax and enjoy.  It is close to the main street and I recommend the coffee and food at the Bali Deli (which is a short walk from the Villa).  We were all sad to leave and hope to return to the Villa again.  This is the only place in Bali that I would stay.  I highly recommend the staff and Villa to anyone considering travel to Bali.  Thank you again to Nilesh and his staff for their extraordinary kindness and friendship and for making our trip to Bali so special.
title: First time to Bali

owner_response.text:
Thank you for your ultimate complement that Villa Seriska is “the only place in Bali that you would stay”! We are glad that we contributed to make your birthday and holiday in Bali so special. Big thanks from Made, our Chef, for the nice comments about his cooking.

We look forward to welcoming you and your family back to Villa Seriska very soon.

The Villa Seriska Team

text:
English/Norwegian

We have spent some wonderful holidays here in Villa Seriska in Sanur.
The villa was perfect for two families with kids from 7-12, especially
the pool and the nice and practical location close to the beach.
We have enjoyed a mix of excursions and the quiet life by the villa,
and the absolute highlight was the snorkling trip to Lembongan Island;
wonderful snorkling and a lot of fish. We have also enjoyed a mix of 
Ketut's nice cooking and dinner at local restaurants. Even the food
at the local night market was a real threat and is wothwhile trying.
Thanks a lot to the friendly staff and especially to Thomas and 
Agung who really became good friends.

Vi har hatt noen fantastiske dager her i Villa Seriska i Sanur. Villaen var perfekt for to familier med barn i alderen 7 til 12 år, spesielt med tanke på det deilige badebassenget og den praktiske beliggenheten ned mot stranden. Vi har storkost oss med en blanding av dagsturer og rolige dager i Villaen. Det absolutte høydepunktet var snorkleturen til Lembongan med fantastisk sikt til korallrev og fisk. Vi har også nydt Ketut’s gode måltider i Villaen og middager på lokale restauranter. Maten på det lokale nattmarkedet rett rundt svingen var spennende og absolutt verd å prøve. Tusen takk til de hyggelige ansatte og spesielt til Thomas og Agung som ble gode venner.

Gro Skaar
title: Great family holiday at Villa Seriska

text: My family, 6 adults and 2 small children, recently had the most FANTASTIC  two-week stay at Villa Seriska. The villa is more beautiful in person than is portrayed in the photos on the website...the gardens are lush, facilities modern and swimming pool picture perfect. We also found that the villa was conveniently located. It is a short walk to the beach, markets, shops and restaurants but is also private and very quiet.  Whilst I could rave on about the accommodation it is really the staff that made this trip so special and memorable. Thomas was a fantastic driver and overall guide...he was flexible, helpful and we hired him most days to explore the island. Likewise, our chef, Ketut, was excellent.  He served us delicious breakfast every morning and several nights during our stay we hired him to cook dinner for us...I highly recommend the seafood feast! What also impressed me was that the staff was always warm and wonderful with our children. I hope that we will be lucky enough to stay at Villa Seriska again oneday. Thank you for our unique Bali experience!
title: An Amazing Villa in Bali

We were so right to do so.  The villa is more than comfortable, it is 5 star luxury, with very comfortable beds, and furnishings. 
The staff are great, Tomas and Ketut were so pleased to welcome us back and fill us in with all the news of the other staff. The girls were lovely. The staff seem to genuinely enjoy their work and this shows with their smiling faces. Tomas and Ketut were so helpful, Ketut going to the Post office for us and helping me organise a push bike, Tomas driving us round Bali and helping me with some painted glass. 
Putra arranged a special birthday cake, and when we complained about the thickness of the pillows, had thinner ones delivered the next day. Nothing was too hard for him. His english was excellent and he was just delightful.  Our friends also loved being there, in fact we loved it so much we have booked again for next year, not for a birthday but because we can.
Nilesh hope to see you In July.
